name: Abomin-Agency!
description: Abomin-Agency! is a party game for 3 to 8 players. Players compete to design the 'best monster for the job' for the clients of Dr. Frankenstein's Super Fantastical Monster Factory. Design & pitch your creation to your fellow players to win the big pay day!

name: Grapple Up!
description: Grapple Up is a game inspired by other one-level, unforgiving platformers such as Only Up, Chained Together, Getting Over It and Sisyphus, but with a grappling hook! Who doesn't love a grappling hook?

name: The Dragon's Intern
description: The Dragon’s Intern is a 2D Adventure Exploration game about an intern- I mean apprentice - who works for a dragon that is hiding under the roads of a city. The boss keeps you busy and each night teaches you about potion making. However, as an apprentice of an underground dragon… you don’t make a lot of money, and have to pay rent in 5 days… Make potions, solve puzzles, and commit petty crimes in order to reach the goal of Not Being Evicted and becoming a Real Wizard.

name: MetroRunner
description: in a post apocalyptic world where the inhabitants of bucharest have moved in the metrosystem you set out on a journey to escape to the surface

name: Jamango!
description: Jamango! is a new gaming platform that enables anyone to create, and play user-generated worlds. Our mission is to unlock imagination, and empower the next generation of game creators.

name: SMOD: Outbreak
description:
I have been laid down in a pit of darknesses and the shadow of death. And thy anger has pressed down upon me; and all thy cares have come down upon me. And from this bed I cry out for the kindling of thy Light!

Outbreak might be best summed up as an add-on to the original SMOD that encourages the same frenzied action as it throws a generous number of hostiles at the player, especially zombies. Following its base, Outbreak's arsenal includes usual suspects like the G36 carbine, as well as less conventional ones such as a katana that gives the player a speed boost.

Outbreak started off in Summer 2007 as a small, personal mod by SMOD: Tactical forum member veteran_gamer. His hobby project was later released and was well received. As time went on, others like Useful, Jen4, and IneptGuard contributed work and ideas as well.

name: Western Death
description:
About the game

Western Death - is a 2D roguelike game with RPG and fantasy elements.

name: Capybara Fighters!
description: Capybara Fighters! is a 2D/3D hybrid beat-em up set in modern Tokyo. You play as the star capybara of a cafe, whose life is disrupted when the Yakuza abduct your friend. To rescue them, you'll battle through enemies, earn money, and ultimately secure a plane ticket to Brazil for the final battle.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
description: An in-flight entertainment video game adaptation based on the popular TV series Who Wants To Be A Millionaire.

name: One Dreamy Night
description: One Dreamy Night is a traditional RPG game that takes inspiration from Yume Nikki to create a surreal world with oddities at every turn. There's things to find to increase your stats and skill set, along with wacky individuals to encounter. You'll get to the end as long as you look and explore.

name: Keep Going
description: Keep Going is a fast-paced top-down action game! Your goal is to survive for 20 days against endless hordes of monsters, always evolving and testing new skills until you find your favorite combo to defeat the 2 villains of this journey!

name: Slime Voyage
description: The platformer where you're broke. Work odd jobs and try not to destroy everything along the way.

name: Up With Doznik
description: Take Doznik home and fight shapeshifters along the way! A short action adventure game.

name: Up & Down
description: Up or down? This is the question.

name: Untold Tales: A Scarlet Way
description: Immerse yourself in the grim and brutal story of Little Red Riding Hood accompanied by heavy music in the genres of Metal and Dubstep, as you explore a dark fantasy world with Victorian-era architecture and technology

name: Out of Sight
description: You’re Sophie, a young blind girl who sees through her teddy bear’s eyes. Escape your captors and uncover the evil history of the dark mansion you desperately seek to escape in this unique, atmospheric horror puzzle/adventure game.

name: Wag
description: Survive the Worst Apocalypse Game in WAG, an action-packed open-world survival game. Battle with zombies, fight other survivors, and find refuge in the central church of the city, your last hope in a chaotic world.

name: Voodoom
description: Voodoom is a casual asymmetric horror game set in a sprawling, eerie mansion. Team up as voodoo dolls to explore, collect powerups, and seek revenge on the monster that cursed you. Or, lurk in the darkness as the giant monster, ready to strike and eliminate the dolls before they grow too powerful.

name: Voxel World
description: A physics sandbox voxel-based simulation game for you to mess with. Build world you can imagine and destroy anything you create.

name: Whispering Death
description: Whispering Death is a short horror experience that puts you in a mysterious realm blending in with your past. Solve puzzles and find out who you are. But remember you are always beeing watched, so think through every decission you make before it's too late.

name: Woodlands National Park
description: Step into the chilling embrace of Woodlands National Park, a first-person survival horror game. As a police officer, team up with friends to find missing bodies and uncover the park's dark mysteries. Armed with weapons and aid from your police car, will you survive?

name: Wire Throne
description: Blast your way out of captivity, upgrade your ride, and unleash devastating firepower to take down the Wire Throne! One life, one car in this roguelite top-down looter shooter!

name: Wisps of the Elements
description: A tactical rogue-lite set in a medieval-fantastic scenery. Defend yourself against your foes, learn the magic of this realm, and discover the deepest secrets of its inhabitants

name: WitchRider
description: This is a building tower defense game with RPG elements to hunt down the demon guard altar.

name: Wizard Duel
description: Study and cast spells and prove yourself in a duel as the superior wizard.

name: Wind Story
description: "Wind Story" is a simulation game, players can immerse themselves in rural lifestyles, including farming, breeding, and fishing. During the day, they can freely roam the Ranch's flower fields, while at night, they can enjoy drinking and dancing by the lakeside bonfire.

name: Winter Girl
description: 'Winter Girl' is a visual novel game that begins with a miraculous encounter with the alien, Se-A. Combining modern direction with classic visual novel charm, it offers an immersive story and interactions. Experience various endings based on your choices.

name: World Eternal: Battlegrounds
description: A thrilling blend of MOBA, Battle Royale, and arcade action with an innovative hero and gear collection system. Experience the first open game economy where players can trade items freely on Steam!

name: Xen
description: XEN is a high-octane "Momentum Fighter" with unmatched freedom of movement, where speed itself is your main resource for combat abilities. Wield your Prism Blade and call upon 10 Elemental Natures in order to build speed and defeat your opponents with both sword and spell.

name: Nerd Simulator
description: It’s never too late to turn your life around! Step into the shoes of a 40-year-old finally ready to leave the nest in this hilarious RPG-Life Simulation mix. Tackle wacky challenges, embrace absurd adventures, and prove that with determination (and a bit of chaos), you can start fresh at any age.

name: Xeroes
description: Xeroes is a fast-paced brawl-action game with charming characters and innovative combat mechanics. Play with friends or solo across a variety of game modes and battle in a variety of familiar and mysterious locations across the world.

name: Xenocrystal TD
description: A Rogue-like Tower Defense game with 10 towers, 5 damage types, 20 abilities, and hundreds of upgrades. Select one or more upgrades to your towers and/or abilities at the end of each level that stay with you through your mission to protect the Xenocrystals. Limitless possibilities!

name: Xenospore
description: Defend humanity against a creeping alien fungus in this strategic, turn-based puzzle game. Destroy tiles to isolate the Xenospore organism and protect populations in a minimalistic yet challenging experience.

name: Yancy
description: YANCY is an NES style action adventure that follows a small protagonist in a vast world full of danger, swords and rewards. Lead your own adventure in a non-linear game world, exploring dungeons, forging magical weapons, battling challenging bosses and unearthing ancient secrets!

name: X-War
description: X-WAR is a dynamic AAA first-person shooter where players can win in-game prizes through unique mechanics not found in any other game.

name: You Must Retry
description: You Must Retry is a roguelike where you will kill crowds of enemies. Dynamic battles, unique items and abilities. Character upgrading for any style of play. And even death here is not in vain, because after each attempt you will become only stronger.

name: Yixin
description: The first love simulator, the real immersive real-life love game, the video novel type, the only pure love experience, takes you into the pure and beautiful love world that seems like dreams, and feels the emotion that has been buried in your heart for a long time.

name: Zilar: Empire of The Underground
description: Zilar is an exploration adventure game developed by two young developers, where we control the main character Zemandevi.

name: Z-ombie Apocalypse: Mark Feygin's War
description: Z-ombie Apocalypse is a third-person shooter in the Survival Horror genre with allegorical and satirical references to the Russian invasion of Ukraine, as well as to the role of Mark Feygin and his YouTube channel in the information war and its geopolitical consequences.

name: You See Me?
description: What do you think consciousness is? Is it a mirror of the soul or a dark labyrinth filled with fears? Losing your only friend means losing your sanity.

name: Youth Northbound
description: This is a story about a runaway male protagonist and a runaway female protagonist who reunite and fall in love in Northeast China. They live in a very embarrassing situation but continue to support each other to get through tough times.

name: Zombiehood
description: Zombiehood is a run-and-gun, zombie-killing, rogue-lite, sandbox game with tight controls and emergent gameplay systems. Also loot. Lots of loot. Additionally, the code is fully open-sourced, inviting you to learn, remix, adapt, and create new content.

name: Zone One
description: Step into the role of Z1, a mercenary unit to search for evidence of an alien species that is invading a space station, an immersive bodycam style first-person shooter, solo or up to 5 players.

name: Zrust
description: Will you be the greatest space pirate? Build your ship, plunder enemies, and conquer the galaxy in Zrust!

name: 1 vs. 1 Football Tournament
description: 1 vs 1 Football Tournament is a fast-paced game that puts your football skills to the test.

name: Commentator
description: "Commentator" is a novel game where you become a commentator for a popular news program. By selecting the news to comment on and your critique stance, you will experience a manipulation of public opinion and a changing a world.

name: Pawnbroker Simulator
description: Welcome to Pawnbroker Simulator, where you're the boss. Build your shop, strike deals, and test your business savvy in this indie simulation game. Dive into a world of trade and management. Can you make it big in the world of pawnbroking? Time to find out!

name: Farming Supermarket Simulator
description: Embark on a relaxing but challenging journey to run your own supermarket. Grow organic plants, take care of your animals and sell products to your customers. Build and expand your shelves. Can you turn your supermarket into an empire?

name: Fantasy World Simulator
description: Open a Pixie shop and dive into an adventure with whimsical creatures. Tame, train, and evolve Pixie characters, then explore the vibrant city with them. Manage your shop, serve customers, and grow your business. Join now and create your own Pixie legend!

name: Electronic Market Simulator
description: Electronic Market Simulator is a detailed simulation game where players manage and operate their own electronics store. Players sell products, boost customer satisfaction, and aim to become the top store. Strategic decisions in store management, customer service, and finances are required.

name: Butcher Simulator
description: Run your own butcher shop! Start with a carcass, cut premium meat pieces, and sell them to grow your business. Upgrade tools, buy supplies, and attract customers. Can you become the ultimate butcher? Find out in Butcher Simulator!

name: Banana Simulator
description: Banana Simulator is a story-driven comedic experience where you play through the various genres of games that have existed throughout video game history! Platformer? Check. RPG? Check. Visual Novel? Double check. The possibilities are endless!

name: Mafia Life Simulator
description: Build your own empire in the world of the mafia! In Mafia Life Simulator, take control of everything from marijuana farms to weapon factories, money laundering centers to drug networks. Become the undisputed leader of the region with your gang and make your name known in the world of crime.

name: Nightwalk Simulator
description: Nightwalk Simulator is a compelling puzzle game that tests your intellect with intricate and varied challenges requiring keen problem-solving skills. There is no traditional narrative, but the world and its mysteries are connected to the storyline of the parent game, The Vision. Set in 1985, your goal is to escape the horrific alternate reality you've been transported to. The game features a large, randomized map with unique puzzles in each playthrough, providing varied experiences. You'll need to solve complex puzzles, manage your flashlight’s battery, and conserve your sidearm ammo. Although the world appears normal at night, beware of zombies and aliens lurking around. Light plays a crucial role in your survival. Using the various street lamps, which are also randomized in their locations, is crucial to conserving battery life and seeing where you aim.

name: Horse Farm Simulator 2024
description: Horse Farm Simulator 2024 (HFS24), is a simulation game that allows you to manage your own horse farm while also providing enjoyable horse riding experiences.

name: Golden Ticket Simulator
description: Immerse yourself in Golden Ticket Simulator, the ultimate virtual cinema experience. Watch movies with friends in stunning virtual theaters and visit iconic movie scenes. Customize your avatar, host private screenings, and make every movie night a social event. Get your Golden Ticket NOW!

name: FPV Military Kamikaze Drone Simulator
description: FPV Military Kamikaze Drone Simulator is an advanced and realistic early access game with kamikaze drones, grenade dropping, night vision and thermal imaging missions.

name: FFS 2024: Football Freekick Simulator
description: Input-based free-kick football game with no randomness, no scripting, only pure skill. Score as many freekicks as you can while the AI goalkeeper and defenders try their best to stop you.

name: Sauna Simulator
description: Run your own sauna: buy a room, equip it with an oven and start earning money from it. Hire employees, ensure safety and, of course, have fun!

name: Rusty Junkyard Simulator
description: Collect junk cars, dismantle them for parts, and restore them to their former glory. Experience the thrill of transforming rusty vehicles into valuable assets, selling them for profit, or racing your restored cars. Turn rust into riches and build your reputation as a top car restorer and racer!

name: Train Simulator
description: At the end of the 1800s, make a difference in the railway industry with your own train. Customize your train and offer luxury and comfort to your passengers. Grow your business with interstation travels, profitable contracts, and new wagons. A relaxing and enjoyable adventure awaits you.

name: Supermarket Simulator VR
description: Strap on your VR headset and dive into the immersive world of SuperMarket Simulator VR. Manage your own supermarket, from ordering stock to designing store layouts. Handle customer transactions, set competitive prices, and expand your business.

name: Streamers Cleaning Simulator
description: Restore order and cleanliness to the rooms of famous Gaming Streamers after their epic gaming sessions. Find artefacts, explore streamers life. Play co-op with your friends.

name: Tree Simulator 2024
description: An ultimate high-end 3D tree simulator. Find out what it's like to be a tree and enjoy all the benefits of being a part of nature. In this simulator many possibilities are waiting for you to finally be a tree, you will be able to control every aspect. A treemendous adventure awaits you.

name: War Drone FPV Quad Simulator
description: FPV quadcopter flight simulator developed in collaboration with military drone operators of Ukrainian Armed Forces. Realistic flight physics, payload mass customization, battery discharge, wind influence and electronic warfare effects. Peaceful freestyle piloting experience is also included.

name: Yacht Life Simulator
description: Experience the ultimate yachting lifestyle in Yacht Life Simulator! Sail, fish, explore exotic islands, and engage with customers via your in-game social media. Customize your yacht, upgrade interiors, hire crew, and embark on thrilling maritime adventures. Ready to set sail?

name: Cartel Simulator
description: As a cartel leader, expand your criminal empire by researching drugs, recruiting loyal employees, and upgrading facilities. Make tough moral choices, engage in combat, and conduct illegal experiments. Betray rivals, raid enemies, and uncover spies. Torture traitors, investigate threats!

name: Retail Simulator
description: Grocery Store Simulator is an immersive simulator that is all about retail, go big or go bankrupt! Everything is in your hands

name: Laundry Simulator
description: Manage your own laundry business! Customize your space, buy washing machines, hire staff, and serve customers. Develop new business areas, expand and decorate your laundry, and sell products. Build the best business!

name: Tombi! Special Edition
description: Tombi! returns in Tombi! Special Edition, the ultimate version of the legendary platforming masterpiece. As the titular Tombi, you leap, bite, and throw your way across stunning 2.

name: Marine Battles
description: Marine Battles is an online PvP Battleship game that allows free placement instead of placing ships in a grid and real-time battles as opposed to the classical turn-based gameplay.

name: Solid Chunks
description: Step into the thrilling world of "Solid Chunks" where your keen eye and dedication are the keys to our society's success! In this fantastically hand-drawn comic book realm, our noble humanoid fly overlords have bestowed upon us the great honor of collecting their precious poo.

name: The Scarlet Cascabel
description: Originally released as part of the Thief: The Dark Project 20th Anniversary Contest, The Scarlet Cascabel (v2) is an improved version of the original fan maps that adds new content and applies many gameplay fixes

name: Vagabond's Quest 2
description: Vagabond's Quest 2 (VQ2) was an ambitious attempt to evolve the original Vagabond's Quest into a 3D web-based MMO during the late 1990s. This sequel retained the core pit-fighting and arena combat mechanics of its predecessor but introduced 3D graphics and a more immersive environment. VQ2 was designed to push the boundaries of web-based gaming at the time, featuring a blend of PvP combat and RPG elements in a fully 3D isometric world. Despite its innovative approach, the project faced numerous challenges, and the development was eventually abandoned.

name: Rolly Cubes
description: An online multiplayer competitive dice-rolling game.

name: Discrete Orange
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Fantasy VI: A Soldier's Contingency
description: Sin descripción

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Conan the Barbarian
description:
Conan the Barbarian has been announced as a DLC guest character in the Khaos Reigns expansion for Mortal Kombat 1.
No release date was announced but the expansion will include a 1 week early access period for the character.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: T-1000
description:
The T-1000 has been announced as a DLC guest character in the Khaos Reigns expansion for Mortal Kombat 1.
No release date was announced but the expansion will include a 1 week early access period for the character.

name: Mind Her Manor
description: Action-adventure game with management elements where you play as a young fox trying to escape the manor of an evil witch.

name: Card Chronicles: Devious Deck
description: Card Chronicles: Devious Deck merges roguelite gameplay with deckbuilding strategy, where every card played comes at the cost of the player's health points. Collect cards, build unique decks, battle fierce monsters and prove yourself worthy, while carefully managing your health. Uncover the truth, immerse in a gripping adventure as you ascend the Tower of Legends, where every decision matters and defines your path forward.

name: Fate/Hollow Ataraxia Remastered
description: Remaster of the Fate/hollow ataraxia, a Japanese visual novel game and the sequel to Fate/stay night.

name: Midnight Murder Club
description: Heart-pounding and hilarious multiplayer FPS fun. Trust your senses and overcome your fears as you’re armed with a flashlight and a revolver, then set against your friends in a pitch-black mansion with surprises around every corner. Hide, seek, & shoot in the dark.

name: Earthless
description: Earthless is planned to be a complete 32-level project by James Paddock (Jimmy), with skies and sprites made by Fuzzball. It is the spiritual successor to Deathless.

name: Wreckfest 2
description: Ready for mayhem? Wreckfest is back, offering the best in full-contact racing with unrivaled destruction! Witness head-to-head battles as you tear apart rival vehicles bit by bit. Powered by the enhanced physics engine, developed by the creators of Wreckfest & FlatOut!

name: The Eternal Life of Goldman
description: The Eternal Life of Goldman is a vibrant yet dark platformer adventure that weaves together legends, fairy tales and myths. Explore a vast hand-drawn Archipelago, inspired by ancient fables and depicted in classic frame-by-frame animation, and defeat a mysterious Deity!

name: Tattoo Tycoon
description: Become a tattoo artist and manage your own tattoo parlor. Find the perfect designs for your curious customers and turn their vague wishes into amazing skin art. Grow from a small personal studio to a multi-parlor business throughout the different districts of Tattuga Bay.

name: Auto Legends
description:
Auto Legends is forged from the passion of car culture.

Immerse yourself in an authentic automotive experience where high stakes pink slip racing meets endless customization. Race and tune your car with real-world performance and visual options, creating the perfect ride that expresses your unique style.

Connect with fellow enthusiasts in an automotive social network. Challenge friends and rivals, join exhilarating car meets, and proudly showcase your latest build. Take your passion to the next level by creating parts, tuning rides, organizing events, or buying and selling cars to become a true tycoon in the car world.

Auto Legends offers multiple paths to greatness. Whatever route you choose, your legend begins here.

Unleash your inner car enthusiast with Auto Legends!

name: Blood for the Old Gods
description: Play with up to 4 players local or online, in Blood for The Old Gods. A flintlock fantasy rogue-lite where you shoot, summon, and survive your way across the war torn countryside, once quaint villages, and sprawling industrial towns culminating in the final showdown against the New Gods.

name: Nicktoons: Android Invasion
description: Sin descripción

name: Fading Faith
description: Fading Faith is a Historical Fiction Dungeon Crawler featuring a challenging blend of exploration, survival and historical learning.Explore the dungeons beneath medieval Jerusalem where philosophers and mystics from across history now stand as testaments to their failed quests.

name: Fright Chasers: Soul Reaper
description: Prominent people in the town of Glenville have begun disappearing. After receiving an anonymous tip, you learn that the disappearances may be the work of a supernatural killer. This sounds like another job for the Fright Chasers! Can you solve the mystery of Glenville and stop the murderer before they claim any more victims? Find out in this bone-chilling hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Fright Chasers: Director's Cut
description: When rumors of an abandoned movie theater and the ghosts that can apparently abduct the living there appear on your blog, you eagerly go to investigate. When you arrive, you quickly find truth to the tales as you encounter specters from the very movies shown in the theater! Can you navigate your way through dangerous films to save the living in time? Find out in this thrilling Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Silent Scream II: The Bride
description: Jessica would never imagine that her big day would turn out to be a nightmare; they had an accident and Jonathan McNealy, her husband, is missing. Things just got more and more bizarre when she encountered a mysterious girl who seemed to be leading her to Jonathan. Jessica had a feeling that the girl was connected to Jonathan. Did she cause the car accident in the first place? Return to the abandoned mansion and search for clues in Silent Scream II : The Bride.

name: Can You See What I See?: Dream Machine
description: Sin descripción

name: Jetpack Man
description: Take to the skies in Jetpack Man, the game that brings a thrilling and innovative twist to aerial adventures.

name: Rabbit on Skateboard
description: Welcome to the world of rabbits and carrots! In Rabbit on Skateboard

name: Kick Them All
description: Self-defense is not a crime—it's a necessity!

name: Control the Ball
description: Control the Ball is a fun and addictive game where you play as a boy who is passionate about soccer and loves to make scissors with the ball.

name: Retro Relics
description: Retro Relics is a cozy sandbox and story-driven treasure hunting simulation, where you immerse yourself into nature and search for ancient artifacts with your metal detector. Explore, dig, help other people find lost belongings and complete your coin and relics collection!

name: Airsoft Range
description: Play against AI in free play mode with difficulties ranging a walk in the park to fighting a literal aimbot or get lost in the immersive campaign going from a no one to a superstar. All in VR

name: Capybara Park
description: Manage your own capybara park in this cozy relaxing management game. Improve the well-being of your capybaras, build new enclosures, unlock new species and much more!

name: Extreme Jump
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-fueled realm of the Extreme Jumping Simulator!

name: Ghost Keeper
description: Become a Ghost Keeper and lead your fearsome minions against the living. Use diverse scare tactics, manage demonic creatures and harness dozens of skills. Oh, and don’t let the Brotherhood catch you! The ultimate scaring experience begins…

name: The Good Old Days
description: A nostalgic metroidvania from the good old days back in 19XX. Take on the role of Sean, a young boy who ventures into the fictional city of Arostia to repay his father's debt. Rescue your 3 friends from imprisonment, defeat strong enemies, all while getting your debt paid in time!

name: Phil's Contract
description: Phil's Contract is a 2D platformer with fast-paced movement with an emphasis bunny-hopping and beat 'em up-esque combat. Featuring charming, yet grimy pixel art inspired from the likes of flash animations.

name: Live Lens
description: Experience the intensity of frontline combat in Live Lens, a hyper-realistic bodycam-style shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5. Engage in tactical gameplay, navigate dynamic environments, and uncover a gripping conspiracy. Are you ready for the ultimate tactical shooter experience?

name: Meridian
description: MERIDIAN is a wellness VR journey through your body, exploring its properties and limitations. Develop new control and sensation. You follow, learn about yourself, learn how to breathe, and embrace the struggle. Then you get better. Then you repeat.

name: The Untethered Void
description: What if artificial intelligence is not evolution incarnate and humanity is left with only Pain as an evolutionary driver. The Untethered Void is a Adventure game in a future world where to be asked to be cured of your fundamental despair, is to ask to be cured of what little self you may have.

name: Hunting Seas
description: Hunting Seas is a Dark Turn-based Boss Hunt RPG. In a flooded world plagued by deep sea horrors, lead a fleet of ship to survival. Hunt larger than life creatures; use their meat and bones to feed your crew; Sail and discover the secrets of the sea...

name: To and Fro
description: An action adventure 3D platformer game in VR. Run, jump, swim, and climb through a lush, colorful world. Collect an assortment of items and power up abilities to access new areas.

name: Angel Guardian
description: Angel Guardian is a side-scrolling action shooter where players take on the role of Kita, a warrior guardian, tasked with saving a prince from the forces of evil. Players can use action shooting, stealth, and hacking to defeat enemies and overcome obstacles

name: Bunny Bunker
description: Bunny Bunker is a small game, mixing City Builder with Tower Defence, where your objective is to help the bunnies build a Bunny colony that is strong enough to send bunnies into space, inorder to escape the ever growing hordes that attack your Bunny Colony.

name: Hostile Takeover
description: A 3-10 player space station scavenging social deduction game. Will you be able to meet quota with your team? Or will you do everything in your power to sabotage them as the traitor?

name: RaiLRhythm
description: The concept of this music game is “Train x Rhythm”! You can enjoy the music game as if you are driving a train! Hit the notes rhythmically to become a top-notch driver!

name: Sunday Morning
description: Yes, yes, I know. The house is a mess, and I should clean it. But you know what? I'm feeling, like, reeeally lazy. If only I had some music to motivate me... Wait, I love this song!

name: The Life and Suffering of Prince Jerian
description: This is a narrative role-playing game telling the story of a crown prince of the Blessed Arknian Empire. You possess great power, but are also burdened by duty. Can you change the world and stay true to yourself? Every decision comes with a cost.

name: Miami Nights: Bartending in the 80s
description: An atmospheric, relaxing visual novel set in 1980s Miami, about an unsuccessful writer turned bartender, where you spend most of your time listening to the stories of your patrons.

name: Children of Saturn
description:
A found footage coming-of-age story about a group of teenagers growing up under an orange sky.

CHILDREN OF SATURN blends first person adventure gameplay with real video recordings to tell an authentic slice of life story.

name: Rogue Titan
description:
Tactical Turn-Based Roguelike
Choose from 8 distinct Archetypes, each offering a unique blend of skills and playstyle, tailoring your Prometheus to your preferred combat strategy. Battle your way to Olympus in this tactical turn-based roguelike, where every combat is a deadly dance, and the world moves only when you do. As the Titan Prometheus, master strategic combat, upgrade abilities, and face mythic foes and permadeath in procedurally generated dungeons.

name: The Liminal Theory
description: What are liminal spaces? What happens when these places collide with each other? Dive into this third-person adventure to explore The Liminal Theory in unique environments like Backrooms, Pools & more. Encounter unique creatures born from Chaos and Limen.

name: Neighbors
description: Neighbors is an intriguing life simulation and dating game. Start a new life and shape your destiny in the mysterious town of Sierra. Build meaningful relationships, experience thrilling paranormal events, uncover dark secrets, and transform your home into a haven of safety and peace.

name: Spinny Dungeon
description: The slot machine roguelike. Each time you hit the SPIN button monsters creep closer to you. KILL 'em! LOOT 'em! EAT 'em! Focus on spells or synergies between symbols. Spin to DIE... or spin to SURVIVE!

name: Never Stop Rolling
description: Sin descripción

name: Tales of Fortune
description: Tales of Fortune is a multiplayer turn-based strategy game that combines roguelike elements with intense arena naval combat. Make critical decisions, adapt to ever-changing situations, and outsmart your enemies at every turn. Are you ready to seize your fortune?

name: Hour of the Witch
description: Waking up alone in a decrepit library with no memory of who you are or what you are doing here you must escape this place before the hour grows too late. Solve puzzles and uncover hidden secrets as you solve the mystery of who you are and why you are here in this top-down survival horror game.

name: Gas Gas Heli!
description: The military's routine training flight has turned into a disaster, and now it's up to you to save the day!

name: Police, Open The Door!
description: Congratulations! You have just been hired by the Benoga Police Department. Investigate the horrible events happening in the city, learn its secrets and stay on the job as long as possible until you are eaten by another monster or something even worse happens....

name: Rayman IV
description: Sin descripción

name: Warno: Expansion Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Character Expansion Set: Sandalphon
description: This set unlocks the new playable character Sandalphon and comes with useful items to get him started. • Supreme Primarch's Awe Sandalphon-Unique Sigil • Canaan Whitebloom x 3 • Azurite's Splendor x 10 • Ambrosia x 5

name: Reverse Dyson Ball: Portal Tower
description: Reverse Dyson Sphere: Portal Tower is a Rogue attack tower defense. The game takes place in an elevated world called "Anti Dyson Ball". Here, you will guide the power of the Folding Tower, commanding different factions and unique characters in battle, defeating strong enemies with them.

name: Gum Flesh
description: Gum Flesh is a turn based roguelike that takes place on the back of a celestial monster. Use your wits and fragile supplies to take on strange creatures and fauna on a planet where you are definitely not welcome. The air is different here. Your body is starting to change.

name: Mystery Boxes
description: Mystery Boxes are strange, ancient artifacts that transform numbers according to their individual rules. Your goal is to figure out these rules and use them to trigger a specific transformation that will unlock the box.

name: House of Fun
description:
Welcome to the House of Fun – The house of infinite casino slots games. Enjoy casino slots spins just for downloading!
From the creator of the most Popular Social slots games: Slotomania, Caesars Slots & Vegas Downtown Slots.

name: Playing the Favorite
description: Sin descripción

name: Echoes of Exile
description: Echoes of Exile is a short horror game where you must carefully navigate through space debris to escape the creature who lurks in the void.

name: Solateria
description: You are a small fire spirit born in a world of perishing spirits. Driven by someone's desperate voice, you embark on an adventure to find the 'First Flame'. Explore the peculiar, hand-drawn world of Solateria, defeat powerful enemies, and uncover the secrets of the world.

name: Tower Lab
description: Tower Lab is a physics-based roguelike tower defense game where strategy meets chaos. Absorb energy from fallen foes, unlock new towers, and synergize your defenses to protect your lab!

name: Cyber Mokugyo
description: Mokugyo is a simple wooden fish simulator game, where by clicking on the wooden fish, you can earn merit points to achieve the effect of refining your character and purifying your body and mind.

name: Bargan's Treasure
description: In "Bargan's Treasure," the player embarks on an adventure to restore a once-thriving village. After a disaster cut off power and water, the villagers fled, leaving puzzles in their wake. Your mission is to solve these puzzles, bring the villagers home, and revive the village.

name: Black Site
description: BLACK SITE is a 1-4 player co-op horror game. Explore the levels with your partner to gather info about some government experiments, while trying to communicate with your partner without being too loud. Free monthly content updates with new levels.

name: Aquest
description: Step into the shoes of the last standing drop of water, tasked with defending against the relentless assault of evil sponges determined to absorb every remaining drop. Although you stand alone, you possess all the water knowledge needed to create impressive structures and fend off your enemies.

name: Golfr
description: Golfr is a sci-fi golf action game. Set in the near future, a robot scout sent from Earth crash-lands on an alien planet that harbors ancient relics locked beneath abandoned golf courses. Golf your way through multiple biomes while engaging hostiles with only a club.

name: Intergalacticorp.
description: Intergalacticorp. is a sci-fi rogue-lite tower defense game where you take on the role of an operator-bot, charged with conducting an intergalactic mining operation. Will you thrive as an efficient miner in this alien environment, or succumb to the dangers that lurk in the depths of space?

name: One Dash Star
description: In One Dash Star, you guide the Playing marbles towards the star by swiping and releasing it. On this exciting journey, you'll navigate through fixed and moving obstacles and save the star. Each level presents new challenges, and the diverse obstacles will test your focus and reflexes.

name: Codename: Zalidium
description: Grab your standard issue pistol and join the agents in Codename: Zalidium. Explore the mysteriously deserted town of Turpentine Ridge. Run and gun down vicious goblins as you try and survive. Search for clues to uncover the strange events that led to their existence. Can you uncover the truth?

name: Sonsgorod: The Archipelago
description: Attack, outmaneuver, misdirect. Sonsgorod is a roguelike card battler where positioning is key, enemies can be turned against one another, and one bad play can cost you everything. You'll need all your skill and creativity to prevail as you journey into the past and face down a mighty empire.

name: Despondent
description: Despondent is a first-person survival horror title. Play as Sedgewick, a young man tossed into a hellish fight for his life while trying to pick up the pieces of his past. Manage a debilitating sickness, hold on to what little hope is left, uncover a rancid plot and just maybe... make it out alive.

name: Jurassic Knights: Tactics
description: Jurassic Knights: Tactics is a turn-based tactical RPG. Navigate a sprawling campaign map, choosing your battles, accepting contracts, liberating settlements, and confronting foes. Optimize your soldiers to their maximum potential based on their backgrounds, traits and equipment.

name: Not Quite A Fairy Tale
description: Welcome to the rogue-like with a unique combat system mixing the depth of turn-based RPGs with the thrill of poker, where your mission is to lose with style! Gather heroes, craft perfect skill combos, and navigate randomly generated dungeons where your boldest plans end in hilariously epic fails

name: Boxville 2
description: Boxville 2 continues the adventure of cans living in a box city. Two friends were setting up fireworks for the city celebration, but a mistake caused chaos and one friend went missing. Now our hero must explore Boxville and beyond to fix everything and find his friend.

name: Noblemen: 1941
description: Set in an alternate reality World War II, Noblemen: 1941 mixes strategy, tactical decision-making, and 3rd person combat. Gameplay is a blend of realistic combat mechanics, historic influence, and fictional elements such as melee combat, heavy armor, mechs, battle suits, vampires, and more.

name: Coral & The Abyss
description: Coral & The Abyss is a sci-fi 2D action RPG with skilled hack’n slash combat and soulslike elements where you explore a mysterious world filled with ambiguous characters and challenging enemies. Explore, fight and survive as you ascend to the peak of the abyss.

name: Jini's Potion Shop
description: Run the Potion Shop with the magic-less magician JINI and the little moon mouse ROKTA HYU! Inform and sell potions to various magicians in need. Explore dungeons illustrated in a cute graphic style to collect rare potion ingredients. And the exciting truth of the world is a bonus.

name: MetalMercs
description: Destroy. Salvage. Repair. Upgrade. PROFIT! A real-time tactical experience where you command your own mercenary outfit of mechs and mercs and adventure through randomly generated missions filled with rewards, glory, and bitter defeat.

name: Beyond the Hours
description: Beyond The Hours is a first-person psychological horror and mystery game that offers a rich, immersive story. Step into the surreal experiences of Adam, the main character, and unravel the eerie events that blur the lines between reality and nightmare.

name: HolyZone
description: It is a strategy and survival game set in a world turned into a desert by nuclear wars. Gather scarce resources, manage your team, build your town, and engage in strategic battles. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Metis: Shadow Days
description: A world born from fluctuations, a pursuit of exploration and change. Players will take on the role of a field fuher at the Metis Biological Institute, meeting more companions on observation trips, making important choices, and searching for the origin and truth of fluctuations.

name: Dark Queen
description: Embark on a journey inspired by Slavic mythology and Croatian folklore in this 2.5D action-adventure game inspired by the likes of Song of Iron, Prince of Persia, Inside and Limbo.

name: Battle Train
description: Outthink, outbuild, outblast! Battle Train combines deck-building and tactical rail combat. Upgrade your train, lay tracks, and destroy your rivals with devastating locomotives. The rails are your battlefield—will you be the last train standing?

name: Deep in The Mine
description: In a fantastic universe, form a group of up to 5 dwarves. Choose a class then set off on an adventure in mines. Be careful, one of you will have become a monster, born to hunt you. Your goal is to extract materials there. Survive by working as a team but also using many gameplay features

name: LocoPets
description: The ultimate team-builder roguelike. Assemble a team of powerful LocoPets, collect game-breaking Charms, and unleash outrageous synergies to defend Tonto Kingdom.

name: NightClub Simulator
description: Step into the vibrant world of nightlife! Create, manage, and customize your very own nightclub. From hiring staff and organizing events to setting the perfect atmosphere with music and lighting, every choice you make will shape your club. Are you ready to become the ultimate nightclub tycoon?

name: Neon Blitz
description: Neon Blitz is an electrifying roguelike where you stand your ground against waves of glowing adversaries. Strategically spend your hard-earned cash on synergistic laser and gun upgrades, crafting the perfect defense to outlast the relentless neon onslaught.

name: Sky Bound Hero
description: An Epic open-world 3D adventure allowing you as the player to fly and collect power capsules within an amount of time. Explore epic alien landscapes as a superhero who can also shoot epic lasers through his eyes.

name: Mr. Death: The Violent Silence
description: Mr. Death is a Terrifying Thriller where you take place as a detective named Sebastian Moonshade in the open world of Woodcarve Town. Your mission is to investigate the murders of the killer Vincent Crowfield whilst playing against his state-of-the-art AI that learns from your actions.

name: Banana 2
description: Banana 2 is a clicker Game, in which you click!!!

name: Mod Shooter
description: A chaotic multiplayer shooter where the rules change every game! Friends not included.

name: Obu
description: Embark on an epic journey in OBU, a top-down shooter blending intense combat with strategic crafting and exploration. Navigate diverse levels, battle formidable foes, and harness your creativity to craft and upgrade gear. Dive into a world where skill and strategy shape your adventure.

name: Vortica
description: Vortica is a 2D action roguelite set in a solar system overrun by hostile aliens. Suit up, loot up, and shoot up as you battle against enemy hordes, explore derelict outposts, and hunt giant bosses. Each mission gets you one step closer to reaching Earth and saving the human race.

name: H.A.S Galactics
description: A factory building, space exploration and rocket construction game. Accept contracts from intergalactic factions to earn reputation and favours, design your own rockets, set up your production lines to automate your rocket construction, manage your resources and become the most reliable colony !

name: Meat Engine
description: Meat Engine is a retro Sci-Fi boomer shooter inspired by Scorn, Quake, Dusk and Doom. The game is set in a dark and distant future stricken with war and death.

name: Unite the Party
description: Unite The Party is a Online 3D Virtual Tabletop using Unreal Engine 5, offering Game Masters a Sandbox kit to run TTRPGs with distant players!

name: Cardinal Descent
description: Master strategic elemental card play in this deck-building roguelike. Unleash devastating combos and discover game-breaking synergies as you delve deeper into the void, facing fierce enemies and escalating challenges. Carefully choose your card order to maximise impact and overcome your foes.

name: Meal: Mystery Escape Room
description: Meal is a mystery escape room game, where you must solve a series of puzzles to progress and discover the truth behind an enigmatic hotel. With challenges and secrets, combining exploration, varied puzzles, and an intriguing story. Can you solve the puzzles and escape from the illuminated hotel?

name: Kafkaesque: The Nightmare Trial
description: Experience Kafka's 'The Trial' as a nightmarish survival horror game. Navigate surreal puzzles and face grotesque manifestations of power as you fight for your innocence in a system designed to crush you.

name: Turbo Bullets
description: They call you Driver because you are the fastest in the market. One day you fall into a police ambush and get an offer you can't refuse - you are to become a police plug. Go undercover to race, shoot and smash a criminal group organizing an illegal "Lethal Tournament". Will you be able to survive?

name: ReMix: Encore
description: a unique musical rhythm action game that combines the elements of Rogue games. In this world, you are able to choose from a variety of heroes with different fighting styles and use the power of music to battle against evil void monsters.

name: The Drawnjuring
description: Fight for your peace and quiet in this quirky action packed rougelite game. Hack and slash your way through doodles, create your army and put an end to the mild annoyance once and for all!

name: Neon Ladder
description: Prepare to reclaim the overtaken earth from manifestations of the seven deadly sins and their ominous leader. Choose your upgrades and paths' carefully - with the assistance of your AI ship you can reset the timeline and fight once again until you stop the sins in their tracks.

name: Escape Gaia: Departure
description: you will play as Gaia, the shattered will of a planet, and command your spaceship to explore new worlds, collect and refine various resources, build a home on the damaged spacecraft, summon a wide range of monsters, and ultimately, devour other shattered wills to repair yourself.

name: New Life
description: A creepy story about a guy who went to a calm and remote city to forget his past and start a new life. But this place turned out to be not as nice and safe as it seemed at first glance.

name: Eastwind Adventures: Chapter 1
description: Eastwind Adventures Chapter 1 is a game of storytelling and adventure for all ages. Go on a great quest with three different heroes, some good, some not so good, and uncover the mysteries and magic of the lands of Eastwind!

name: Mobula
description: Dive into a sprawling, interconnected underwater world and fight battle-hardened foes in this Top-Down 2.5D Action Adventure.

name: The Twelve Slot Saloon
description: The Twelve Slot Saloon is a Turn-Based RPG with Bullet Hell elements, where your choices matter as you travel across "The Land Without Happy Endings"! Play as a Cat, and explore this Wonderland by yourself, or with Friends! (Single-Screen Co-op.)

name: Sniper 3D
description: Tired of learning things that just don't captivate your interest?

name: Pac-Man: Ghost Zone
description: Pac-Man Ghost Zone is a cancelled 3D Pac-Man game that was in development for the PlayStation. Many of the concepts featured in this game would be reworked into Pac-Man World.

name: Apogea
description: Apogea is a medieval fantasy massively online multiplayer role playing game.

name: Intrigue Inc.: Raven's Flight
description: A legendary secret agent has gone rogue and Intrigue, Inc. needs you to track him down. Uncover Raven's diabolical plan and foil his grasp for power and glory in this exciting Hidden Object Puzzle adventure game. Take on Raven's incredible intellect and think two steps ahead to capture him before he takes over the entire planet in Intrigue Inc.: Raven's Flight

name: Watch Your Eggs!
description: Experience the thrilling world of Watch Your Eggs!, an action-packed third-person shooter game. As Agent Pops, your mission is to protect unhatched Frostwing Penguin eggs from wild Icy Land creatures. Plan your strategy, equip yourself with powerful weapons, and face the wave of furious enemies!

name: Deck Dash
description: Create your deck, improve your cards by merging them, and defeat all your opponents. To be a survivor, don’t forget this; collect the best items you can find and upgrade them. Exciting duels await you on this island.

name: Morriton Manor Stories: Nordic Whispers
description: A mystery detective game with RPG elements. Cursed by demonic forces, a mysterious island is trapped in a time loop. Leah Glessner, Private Investigator of the Supernatural, uses her unique gift of photographic memory to confront evil. Skill your character. Investigate. Solve the case.

name: Three Kingdoms: Zhuge Liang
description: Employ tactics and formations to conquer cities and dominate the land, ultimately unifying the realm. The game features HD-2D graphics, offering a refreshing and stunning visual experience. Combining 2D pixel art style with 3D scenes, it delivers a visual feast for players.

name: Porklike: Wurst Comes to Worst Gameboy
description: Sin descripción

name: A Bug's Life: Active Play
description: Sin descripción

name: Mental Salvo
description: Mental Salvo is a top down art game with an infinite open world where you can explode your head and do so many other things, they're impossible to list. It will tickle your brain in various ways. You can spend hours walking and interacting and keep stumbling upon new things. Follow your curiosity.

name: A Simple Door
description: Try to escape from “A Simple Door” by facing your past, your darkest secrets and your fears through the doors.

name: Depth Ascend
description: Embark on an epic race for your survival, feeding on fish before time runs out. Unlock new levels as you dodge dangers and uncover the mysteries of the depths in Depth Ascend.

name: Fish Chips and Bombs
description: Dive into the fin-tastic world of PvP (Phish vs Phish) where you use your gravity defying fishing rod to move around bombs and blow your fish friends into chips! It’s a reel blast!

name: Cyber Hearts Club
description: Cyber Hearts Club is an immersive game where players enter the virtual world of the Social Media Club. In this game, you'll have the opportunity to study and navigate the fascinating intricacies of social media, encountering various challenges and characters that enrich the experience. Throughout your journey, you'll make important decisions and discover new ways to interact with the digital community. Cyber Hearts Club blends captivating storytelling with a deep exploration of social media phenomena, providing an UNFORGETTABLE gaming experience.

name: City Bus Driver Simulator 2
description: “Do we have to wait long for the bus?” it's a phrase that will never be heard on your route.

name: Ravenwood Drive
description: Explore the eerie depths of Ravenwood Drive as Emma, drawn by a mysterious letter. Your journey quickly turns dark, where every shadow conceals a sinister truth. Dare to confront the darkness within.

name: Night Keep
description: In Night Keep you build your own empire and defend it against waves of enemies.

name: Make It Count
description: Make It Count is a post-apocalyptic, top-down shooter with roguelite elements. Venture into different missions with randomized routes and bring carnage to the filth that is infesting this world!

name: RogueCards
description: This "RogueCards" is a deck-building and roguelike version of "Daifugo" a game that all Japanese have played before! You use 53 cards, including jokers. How they grow depends on luck and your judgment. Aim for a stronger deck! Try the even more strategic "Daifugo".

name: DreamWorld
description: The Infinite Sandbox MMO. For Builders, By Builders. Explore an infinite world with all your friends on one server. Build unbelievable structures using advanced building tools like volumetric selection and copy/paste. Battle bosses and mobs, farm, craft and more in DreamWorld.

name: CatClick
description: CATCLICK is an exciting adventure game where you help a mother cat find her lost kittens. Play in Relax Mode, simply enjoying the search process with pleasant music, or choose the Bad Cats Mode where you save the world from mutant cats. Explore levels, enjoy beautiful effects, and intuitive controls

name: Nightmare Within
description: Nightmare Within - is an atmospheric horror game built on Unreal Engine 5 by a solo developer. Explore the dark corners of a house with a flashlight and solve puzzles while trying not to scream.

name: Fear Followers
description: A co-op horror about investigating and recording monsters to earn reputation for your Cult. You keep the recordings you make whether or not you die.

name: Isle of Reveries
description: Make a pilgrimage skybound to the Isle of Reveries, where any wish can be granted. Conquer mysterious dungeons, solve head-scratching puzzles, and fight dangerous enemies in this retro-inspired action adventure.

name: Naals Tales
description: Hook into a physical platforming adventure with Scark'Tee, a fearless Naal who dwells on the inhospitable moon of Naltiune.With his long tail, Scark'Tee swings, fights, and slides through perilous environments, helping his friends and facing unique challenges.

name: Night Shift
description: Night Shift is a choice-driven Adult Visual Novel that focuses on Urban experiences. The game is packed with humor, sex, romance, crime, action, drama, and an intriguing story. Play as a young black male trying to figure out his path or a young white former star athlete trying to prove his worth.

name: Defender of Falyndor
description: Defender OF Falyndor is a First-Person Tower Defense game in Virtual Reality! Take control of your character, towers, and much more to protect Falyndor from waves of invasions to become the ultimate Defender of Falyndor!

name: Magic vs. Mind
description: MvsM (Magic vs Technology) is a stylized cartoon-themed co-op PvE game where two different teams fight against enemy creatures on the same map. The game can be played with a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 8 players.

name: Stellar Checkpoint
description: Inspect alien documents as Earth's first interstellar border agent. Verify passports, detect forgeries, and make crucial decisions that impact human-alien relations. Can you keep Earth safe while navigating complex intergalactic regulations?

name: CardScrawl
description: Enter the Chaotic Tower and take part in the Tower Lord's gambit in this Auto Battler, Roguelike Deckbuilder. Wielding the power of your Creature and Enchantment decks, the limits of your strategy will be tested. The Tower Lord awaits a worthy opponent. Are you ready?

name: Queen Slayer
description: 'Queen Slayer' is a turn-based RPG set in a fascinating fantasy world. The player must lead heroes of various professions and skills to defeat the powerful queens who dominate the underground dungeons and save the kingdom from darkness.

name: Zoned
description: A procedural VR-Action game. Humanity sent out probes to prepare solar systems for our descendants. A probe calls back requesting manual assistance. Use your headset to remotely plug into a Service Robot at location. Upgrade. Find the malfunction & Save humanity’s Solar Garden of a Civilization.

name: Lizards Must Die 2
description: Lizards Must Die 2 is a cooperative slasher action game, a high–quality continuation of the SENSATIONAL first part. Insidious lizards attacked the lands of the Rus again. HYPERBOREA is on fire and only the GLORIOUS HEROES can lick the invaders from their homeland.

name: Island Escape 2
description: You are stranded on an island, and here you can do quests for the inhabitants, level up your character, build whatever you want, play with cool weapons and much more. Your goal is however to find a way off the island and find out how you got there. As mentioned, you can build, craft, and you can also manipulate the island's terrain.

name: Swamp Hunter
description: Swamp Hunter, A Creature Slayer Extraction Looter game utilizing the latest features of Unreal Engine 5. Pushing the boundaries of of political satire and hilarious social commentary to deliver a game that is almost as crazy as our real life world.

name: Shareholders
description: Welcome to Shareholders an economy \ strategy \ simulator. Explore the depths of a simulated economy that is rich with mechanics and activities: from production and stock market manipulation to managing consumer demand and influencing global trade through exports and imports.

name: The Green Book
description: Welcome to The Green Book: Your Cozy Journey into Magical Plant Shopkeeping!

name: Globe Games
description: A suite of turn based games and puzzles on a spherical grid: Chess, Go, and Othello.

name: Undivine
description: A dark metroidvania with RPG elements, "Undivine" challenges you to explore, battle, and uncover secrets in a desolate, interconnected world. Customize your abilities, wield unique weapons, and delve into deep lore filled with mystery.

name: Tiny-Fi
description: Your house is a vast and dangerous place, especially when you've been shrunk to the size of a bug! In Tiny-Fi, join Alain's struggle to survive in the attic. Can you make it out of the house in this atmospheric adventure? Your home has never felt so big!

name: Azooma
description: "Azooma" is an action-adventure game where players control an introverted boy navigating the humorous challenges of avoiding family gatherings.

name: Keep This Land
description: Heavy metal, battle wizardry and blood of monsters from the deep. Will you keep this land from evil?

name: Roadlike
description: Roadlike is a roguelike arcade racing game combining classic high-speed thrills with procedurally generated tracks. Customize your car with upgrades and enjoy endless replayability, racing solo or with friends in local multiplayer!

name: Backseat
description: Backseat is a horror game where you play as a taxi driver forced to transport sinister passengers and survive the ride. An unknown man has kidnapped your wife and demands you gather information on each passenger. Can you survive the night and uncover the mystery behind your wife's kidnapping?

name: Business Odyssey
description: In this game, you start with a small capital and aim to build a business empire in the city by deciding which business to set up in which shop and deciding the prices. Business Odyssey is a business simulation that will test your business acumen and strategic planning skills.

name: One More Game
description: A role-playing game that you will collaborate with your junior sisters and challenge them to compete in esports games, helping them win the final championship.

name: Luminedge
description: Slash your way through intense laser sword combat with up to 4 players! Or lead your army into battle, solo or 2-player co-op, in a node-based conquest campaign.

name: MultiMaze Party
description: Chaotic mazes, cute animals, ruthless races. Anything goes in this completely wacky local multiplayer game !

name: Lumen Inferius
description: Explore a haunting and punishing world in this 2D action RPG. Lumen Inferius combines fast-paced combat with intricate RPG mechanics. Traverse ancient ruins, dark forests, and decaying castles, uncovering secrets of a cursed land. Your skill and strategy will determine its fate.

name: Whispering Age
description: Whispering Age is a strategy where you command your army through written orders. Manage resources, build your empire, and defend your base against waves of enemies. Adapt to the unique dynamic of indirect control and lead your kingdom to glory!

name: Norowareta: The Three Treasures
description: Embark on a chilling journey as a young woman uncovers her past, answering the call of a tormented soul. Explore an isolated shrine in Japan and be transported back to the Edo period. Navigate through the mysteries and terrors of a fateful night in this spine-chilling horror survival game.

name: Moon Colony
description: Play as an astronaut on our moon in the future. Your task is to prepare the moon for future colonies by terraforming. Collect resources, explore procedurally generated caves, build buildings and create a second world for you and our earth.

name: Call of The Deep
description: A short first-person retro sci-fi horror game where you traverse to the bottom of the ocean on foot, in 1985.

name: Echo of Fear: Vol.1 Night Visit
description: ECHO OF FEAR is a psychological horror game where you play as a detective who receives a box containing 6 mysterious videotapes. Each tape represents a separate story connected by a common plot. The plot is based on the Cthulhu myths by H.P. Lovecraft.

name: Drive Out
description: Drive out is a horror game for up to four players in online co-op. As a member of a Ghost Exorcism Agency, accept commissions and, together with friends, travel to various locations to investigate, find ghosts, and exorcise them.

name: Error86
description: Bullet hell about destroying computers. Be the ultimate bug you ever wanted to be. Swarm those capacitors and break the boards! [THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT]

name: Backrooms: Facility Unknown
description: Backrooms: Facility Unknown - Is a co-op horror game about exploration of dangerous facility. Wander around the complex alone or with friends. In any case, your task is to do your job and survive

name: Slidezzle
description: A sliding puzzle game! Your goal is to move all the colored blocks to their designated tiles, by moving everything in the same direction at the same time. Think ahead and plan your moves carefully to solve each level.

name: Tchin
description: Play a 3D Monster Taming Open World game ! Tame Tchins and use them for battle. Every Tchin is unique, they can have different colors,bones and brain. Raise your own custom army of tchins and conquer the world!

name: Enigma Awaken
description: You are a mercenary hired by a billionaire to retrieve an ancient artifact from a lost civilization. Explore diverse landscapes, solve complex puzzles, and engage in thrilling action. This solo-developed, AI-assisted game offers a rich story with surprising events and stunning visuals.

name: Project X: Light Years
description: A modern reimagining of the classic Amiga side-scrolling shooter. Engage in high-octane space combat as you navigate through visually stunning environments, obliterate swarms of enemies, and upgrade your arsenal to become the ultimate space fighter pilot.

name: BrickLike
description: A refreshing twist on an old classic, mixing arcade gameplay with the roguelike genre. Test your skill, break bricks, make combos, turns balls aflame and electrify bosses in this frenetic experience!

name: Distant
description: A mysterious object brings a former detective to a distant place in the middle of nowhere, where the worst nightmares clash with reality. Are you prepared to face your fears in what might be your last investigation?

name: ClaustrophobicCrypt
description: Map the labyrinth in your mind, your sanity and escape a derelict spaceship's terrifying maze in Claustrophobic Crypt, a single-player psychological horror adventure. Experience dread in stunning resolutions up to 4K and silky smooth 120 FPS gameplay.

name: A Gentlemen's Dispute
description: Be the last gentleman standing in this old-fashioned slapstick party brawler! Wield preposterous and laughable items and collect insane perks to cause maximum chaos. Destroy your private islands, gardens, and ballrooms. Anything it takes to prove yourself the most gentlemanly of them all!

name: Fallen Echo
description: Explore cool pixel style levels fighting your way through alien hordes that have taken over planet earth, and you will navigate through traps set to frustrate your mission helping the human resistance. You are humanity's last hope.

name: Neo Ha_Bits
description: Neo Ha_Bits plunges players into a chilling journey of psychological horror and mystery within a cyberpunk setting.

name: Cyborg: Rise
description: An adventure game that combines first person shooter and Roguelite random elements. Players can manipulate heroes with different abilities in the game. Embark on adventure challenges in random levels. Every time you respawn, you can unlock new skills and equipment to challenge stronger enemies.

name: Nonentity Galaxy
description: Nonentity Galaxy is a rouge-lite strategy game about starship battle, asset management, dark humor, and jobbery. You need to play the role of a fleet commander in the field to make money for the company , just try to survive in these miserable times. Fortunately, you have friends, life goes on.

name: Hexaquest
description: Play as a magical die in this ‘dice-builder’ RPG where each of your faces casts a different spell. Discover and combine new spells as you explore a world of eccentric animate board game tokens, all fighting for the affections of the Gods of the Tabletop...

name: Croak Cafe: From Pond to Plate
description: Croak Cafe: From Pond to Plate is a thrilling roguelike game where you craft dishes under time pressure to serve demanding frogs. Upgrade your skills and face challenging bosses in this fast-paced culinary adventure. Can you become the ultimate chef?

name: Duriano
description: Duriano is a top-down arena shooting Slasher roguelike game where the player will be a hero durian of the norse wielding a weapon to fight upon a god of norse mythology. From different weapons, Durian hero, God’s trail, items will lead the player to create a build and defeat all gods of asgard.

name: Oh the Humanity!
description: An alien civilization found the remaining ruins of the humans, millions of years after they went extinct. Aliens think humans were vicious, fool and disgusting creatures based on its own research. Almost no technology was found, except some petrified war machines and vehicles.

name: Tiny Terraces
description: A cozy idle farming game, watch tiny guys do tasks around the terrace, expand, progress, and decorate your Tiny Terrace.

name: Descent X
description: Descent X is a top-down bullet shooter that focuses on maneuvering and prop stacking. In this cyberworld full of enemies, use your imagination and creativity to match a variety of combat styles and define a game experience that is uniquely yours!

name: Zillions of Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Pigeon
description: Pigeon is an action adventure in the original universe. Immerse yourself in a deep and interesting story. Playing as Richard, set out to save the village from the hordes of creatures that have been trapped for centuries in the bowels of the earth.

name: Duelant
description: Blood, money and courage merge in different eras. It's time to determine the strongest fighter in this virtual world. Exciting battles await you in a variety of environments where your skill and chutzpah will play a decisive role.

name: Destruction Simulator
description: Destruction simulator is a demolition simulation game, where you take on the role of a construction worker. You are tasked with the destruction of multiple buildings, using your tools to fullfill your job.

name: Shroud
description: In an otherworldly twilight born from the petals of a mysterious cosmic flower, a shrouded girl seeks to sever the threads holding it together. In this 2D action platformer, use your ferocity and grace to traverse a variety of unique levels full of methodical encounters and untold new powers.

name: Achieve-Its
description: Welcome to Achieve-Its, the adorable and fast-paced platformer that challenges you to collect as many achievements as possible in record time! Dive into a vibrant, colorful world filled with cute characters, tricky obstacles, and a plethora of achievements waiting to be unlocked.

name: Scavenged By Sunset
description: Scavenged by Sunset is a multiplayer (4vs1) survival horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Hunter, and the other four players play as Prey, trying to avoid the Hunter. Collecting coins and traveling through portals allow Prey the ability to escape to victory!

name: Aquario
description: Let's face it, we all were once kids. There was a time when we wanted pets, and there was a moment when we wanted to keep a pet fish. Some of us got what they wanted; some didn't. Some cried, some forgot. Aquario is the game where you can live through this traumatic experience again, or anew.

name: Earth: 3000
description: A post-apocalyptic survival RPG set on a desolate future earth, with unrestricted PVP, player-controlled towns and factions.

name: Holy Diver Collector’s Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Find Cats: DLC 01
description: Free DLC100 cats [10% are hidden cats]Two maps [One are hidden maps]

name: XPlane 12
description: X-Plane 12 is the initial version of the newest flight simulator from Laminar Research. X-Plane 12 includes new features such as new aircraft, an updated user interface, moving jetways, seasons, and a new lighting, sound and effects engine. It contains numerous flight model updates, an entirely updated ATC system, new Primus avionics, Navdata updates, and recut global scenery.

name: Marmelade
description:
An immense beast walking, someone who is not you sleeping in a house - things you've seen, heard, the last piece of a strawberry that you must remember to keep existing.

MARMELADE is a point-and-click visual novel about an inner chaotic world, memories and a sword, about being Jam and choosing your route.

name: Ednaldo Pereira: Mescladasso DX
description: Remaster of the original 2D collectathon platformer Ednaldo Pereira: MESCLADASSO. Play as Ednaldo and Fleig, going through a plethra of different stages.

name: World Kicks
description: World Kicks is a soccer arcade game release by Namco.

name: Somewhere in Hell
description: Somewhere in Hell is a mod inspired by Krinkels' Madness Combat mainline flash series. Featuring over 15 weapons, 3 playable characters, and a whole lot of violence.

name: C.O.Ś.
description:
C.O.Ś. is a 3D futuristic sci-fi horror game focusing on feelings of isolation and fight for survival.
During its gameplay player learns the history and secrets moving alone through an abandoned space station.

name: Dennis and Gnasher
description: Sin descripción

name: Super World Stadium '99
description: Super World Stadium '99 (スーパーワールドスタジアム'99, literally: Sūpā Wārudo Sutajiamu '99), is a baseball arcade game that was released by Namco in 1999 only in Japan; it runs on Namco System 12 hardware and is the twelfth entry in the company's long-running World Stadium series. It is also the fifth entry in the series that does not use a Yamaha YM-2151 FM sound chip for music (as with its four immediate predecessors, it uses a C352 custom sound chip for everything) and the second title in the series which features three-dimensional polygonal graphics (as well as non-identical-looking players).

name: TinyRogue
description:
You must brave the depths of the dungeon and defeat the boss, only then can you exit and emerge victorious. Tiny Rogue is a minimalist rogue-like dungeon crawler set among randomly generated mazes, with multiple classes to choose from (each with their own abilities) to brave the depths against increasingly powerful monsters.

The MicroPython (PicoDisplayPack and Thumby) versions of the game have been created to be moddable by users of the game. Source code for the Pico-8 and MicroPython is also included.

Ascii mode can be switched on in the settings menu.

name: Sooty's Revenge
description: Enter "Sooty's Rest," the forbidden forest where the legendary fire prevention mascot, Sooty The Bear, is real. Use your compass, flashlight, and survival skills to escape his pursuit. Navigate, hide, and outsmart Sooty in this thrilling wilderness survival horror game. Can you make it out alive?

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Fushigi no Dungeon
description:
Kidou Senshi Gundam: Fushigi no Dungeon is a game released on April 19, 2004 for i-mode mobile phones. It was developed by Chunsoft and provided by Bandai Networks.

As the title indicates, this system applies the roguelike mechanics of Chunsoft's flagship game "Mystery Dungeon" to the mobile suits from Bandai's flagship series, "Mobile Suit Gundam."

The player controls the Gundam and fights the Zeon army's mobile suits. There are 14 stages from Side 7 to A Baoa Qu.

name: AceForce 2
description:
AceForce 2 is a 5v5 multi-role PvP mobile shooter game developed by Tencent's Morefun Studios. Powered by Unreal Engine 4, AceForce 2 offers exhilarating tactical combat experiences!

The game pushes the boundaries of what can be achieved on mobile, offering unparalleled game mechanics and ultimate gaming experiences. With original map designs, character abilities, and precise shooting mechanics, it revolutionizes the traditional shooter game formula, offering rich strategic options for tactical shooting with endless possibilities in every match. The unique aesthetic of AceForce 2 delivers characters, weapons, maps, and sound effects which quality rivals that of PC gaming.

[Exhilarating Competition & One-Shot Kills ]
In this 5v5 multiplayer PvP shooter game, players enter a fiercely competitive arena where they showcase their shooting skills. Succeeding demands not just quick reflexes but also pinpoint accuracy to swiftly take down foes on a dynamic battlefield, offering an unparalleled sensation of instant kills.

[Strong Teams & Tight Strategies]
In this game, teamwork and strategic planning are paramount. Players must collaborate closely, leveraging their individual skills and strengths to devise smart tactics that collectively challenge their adversaries. Only through solid unity and thoughtful division of tasks can players secure victory in intense team battles and overpower their enemies with unparalleled combat prowess.

[Take Aim and Shoot True]
In this game, precise marksmanship is the ultimate path to dominance. Each character possesses unique skill sets that, when combined with different weapons, result in optimal combat effectiveness. Players must continuously improve their accuracy, identify enemy vulnerabilities, and hit targets accurately. Only with accurate and flawless shooting can one become the ace on the battlefield.

[Intense Firefights & Slick Combat]
Gunfights reign supreme in this game, requiring players to demonstrate advanced marksmanship and elegant combat techniques. By skillfully using terrain and swiftly reacting to enemy attacks, players can exhibit graceful dance-like movements. Maintaining composure and elegance amidst the chaotic barrage of bullets is crucial to gaining the upper hand on the battlefield and becoming an unparalleled marksman.

name: EarthBound Dimensions
description: Earthbound Dimensions is a fanmade unofficial playable reimagination of EarthBound/MOTHER 2, but translated and adapted to modern 3D systems.

name: Shadow Falls
description: Shadow Falls is a first-person horror game, where you explore a mysterious farmhouse deep in the forest, solving eerie puzzles and uncovering secrets that reveal the thin veil between the world of the living and the dead. Delve deeper and uncover the sinister forces that led you here.

name: Pizza Hub
description: Pizza Hub  is a fun clicker game where you create unique pizzas and meet friends in a lively multiplayer adventure!  Earn money by being in the hub and buy special pizzas from our chefs.  Join us on Discord to create pizzas, enjoy the pizza disco, and build a pizza paradise!

name: Tapybara
description: Next-level cozy clicker game! Click on the tapibara, dress up the tapibara, feed the tapibara, and enjoy the meditative gameplay.

name: Manatee
description: Manatee is an epic creature-collecting clicker game! Earn money to expand your aquarium and invest in upgrades to earn even more money. Every 3 hours a random manatee will be dropped. Join the Manatee community today!

name: Pineapple
description: Click the Pineapple and collect them all!

name: Conflict 2: Blitz
description: Traditional RTS real-time strategy, from the beginning of high school to now, Conflict 1, Conflict 2 Western Front, Conflict 2 Blitz. In general, a person development, overall simple, please forgive me.

name: Bean
description: Welcome to Bean, the clicker game more addictive than cat videos! Click your way to bean glory, gathering beans faster than you can say "bean counter." Unlock mysterious inventory drops with golden beans, magic beans, or baked beans. Dive in and may the beans be ever in your flavor!

name: Marketplace
description: Marketplace is an idle/clicker Game, in which your score increases! Everytime score increases there is a chance for you to obtain an item from a Marketplace! Come and join us on our Discord, making marketplace a richer place!

name: Street Flicker
