description: The Ultimate PVP/PVE Puzzle Fighter! Challenge the world in this quick-play skill-based game. Or join Matcha Bee in a quirky single player story mode and experience the mean Streets of Canaan! #NoPayToWin

name: Cucumber
description: Cucumber is a never before seen jump Game, in which you jump with a cucumber! Get a random cucumber every 3 hours and grow your fantastic cucumber collection!

name: Evil Dark
description: Keep the lights on until dawn breaks—or risk becoming prey to what lurks in the darkness.

name: Fantasy TD Battles
description: Competitive, multiplayer Tower Defense with RPG elements. Upgrade your towers, cast abilities, choose your talents, and outlast your opponents against waves of enemies. May the best strategy win!

name: Chronal Stasis
description: Travel to the past and blast your way through to save the timeline in Chronal Stasis, a 2.5D time-traveling platformer-esque game that combines classic run and gun elements with time-based abilities. Join Henry as he fights to save his family and fix the timeline. Is it really that simple though?

name: Sombra
description: Sombra is a 2D platform video game with a pixel art style where you have to guide a cat to the exit of the cave it has fallen into, with the only option of clicking a button to perform different actions.Help this scared little kitty find her way back home.

name: Mega Man ZX Prequel
description: Rockman ZX Prequel is a Mega Man ZX fangame created by the Chinese group Rockman Lab, set between the events of the Mega Man Zero and Mega Man ZX series. Unlike the ZX series, there are only two playable Biometals.

name: No-Hi
description: No-Hi is a parkour platformer, combo your moves to get fast and cut your way with momentum! Explore the map the way you want, never being lost. Face unique bosses with gracious movements. Sinergize itens to make your own gameplay style.

name: Oroboro
description: Explore an open world and fight foes for loot and resources in a 2D side-scroller action RPG. Then return and share with your friendly NPCs, manage relationships, gossip, progress skills, and rebuild the destroyed town.

name: Infinite Void
description: Embark on an endless cosmic odyssey in Infinite Void! Master retro-inspired space shoot 'em up gameplay with procedurally generated universes, dynamic upgrades, & simple controls. Every run offers a unique challenge. Will you conquer the "Infinite Void" or succumb to its celestial challenges?

name: Drone 'em All
description: Drone 'em All is a cartoonish arcade rogue-like with a pinch of satire. Fly your drone, kill nasty Zorks and free the invaded country of Braveland. Upgrade drones, eliminate mini bosses and explore the dramatic stories of local residents.

name: A Game of Gods: Infinium
description: Discover a new adventure with every playthrough in this unique fantasy RPG. Every choice matters as you uncover what secrets Infinium is hiding. Will you become a daring adventurer or a rich mogul?

name: Astraia Land
description: Astraia is an innovative game that combines equipment building, dungeon challenge, platform jumping and LAN team up online. The game requires a certain amount of maneuverability, players need to sprint, jump, and avoid enemy skills and barrage.

name: Amusia
description: Play as Lambert, who stumbles across Cadenzia, a world formed by Classical Music, and aims to help Satan destroy this world.

name: Kelder
description: Trapped in a sinister post-Soviet basement, uncover the truth behind dark experiments and eerie anomalies. Solve puzzles, find keys, and survive against terrifying entities as you explore this atmospheric survival horror. Can you escape the depths of the Kelder?

name: AngelGaze
description: 90s EGA Point and Click adventure

name: Encounters
description: Encounters is an open-world, Exploration game about hunting for aliens and cryptids

name: Endless Onslaught
description: Fight hordes of zombies whilst upgrading your weapons and buying effects in the shop. Carefully make your way around the map, picking up ammo, sneaking around zombies and collecting precious potions. Choose from 4 unique maps, with different shops and zombie types.

name: The Song of Awakening
description: The Song of Awakening is a 2D action-platformer where you play as a bard with the power to create magic through music. Explore a world once ruled by the Lyramancers, wielders of music-magic, who were extinguished by a mad king. Defeat the malevolent god of silence and restore harmony to the world.

name: Warband Survivors
description: A unique mixture of vehicular combat and a wide selection of awesome characters, deploy into big map of an action packed events and objectives.

name: Pocket Robots
description: Program your robot in real-time to fight in a nervous 2D fighting game !

name: Death Plunder
description: Death Plunder is a 2D pixel platen survival game,You'll play as a mortal who risks everything for a treasure,Deep into the quarantined zombie island,plunder all kinds of loot and supplies To ensure survival.

name: Forgotten Red Fog
description: Forgotten Red Fog is a turn based JRPG with the pinch of the perfect timing for certain battle skills. The game's focus is the linear story, the characters and the cruel, racist world.

name: Tank Hunter
description: Wasteland sci-fi style light meat pigeon tank shooting game

name: Floating World
description: 【Survival】|【Building】|【Sandbox】 Start with just a raft, the rest is up to you!

name: Rim: Soul Jar
description: RIM: Soul Jar is a hack and slash roguelite set in a world where medieval and futuristic elements mix. Become a warrior who has fallen into the past and embark on a journey to save the future with the Soul Jar. Cleanse dungeons of enemies and bosses, and set out to break the cycle of RIM.

name: Star Shogun
description: Kohanga Shogun is a first person sci-fi colony building game with economy management and vehicle combat. We've got a touch of 4X, a touch of RTS, and lots and lots of mech on mech action!

name: Cross Brawl
description: Embark on thrilling battles solo or with friends in our fast-paced game! Unlock a plethora of weapons, skills, and gadgets. Collect stunning skins to stand out. Explore mysterious locations and engage in epic battles like never before!

name: 7Years
description: 7Years is a first-person, story-based horror game. Traverse open-world maps as you investigate for clues, solve puzzles, uncover mysteries and elude unique demonic enemies, each created to trigger a specific fear and keep you from your only mission: survive and save your wife.

name: Dojo City
description: Dojo City is a 3D action video game set in a reimagined, present-day New York City that is overrun by out-of-control martial arts dojos.

name: Persecution: The Elevator
description: Persecution - The Elevator is a first-person psychological thriller. Explore an ordinary apartment in a new building, where one night strange things begin to happen.

name: Idle Casino Empire
description: A casual casino themed idle game with a lot of replayability. Attract and cynically exploit your customers to expand your casino empire globally and beyond.

name: Times of Survival
description: A top-down action-rpg survival game where you face the threat of zombies alone or in co-op and expand the survival zone of humanity. Explore a ruined city, gather supplies and craft powerful weapons. Support human settlements, reclaim territory and win the war against the zombie hordes.

name: Flip & Fit
description: Flip & Fit is a physics-based party game for 1-4 players. Pick up and play through the coop puzzle game show on a clock! Will you make it all the way to the show finale?

name: UnLoop
description: You are trapped in a time loop anomaly aboard a space station while on a secret spy mission. Team up with your past copies to break free in UnLoop, an atompunk VR adventure.

name: Vs. Self
description: Tyoma leads a double life... a life of crime and deception. His carefully crafted life is thrown into shambles when he creates an unexpected bond with a gas station customer.

name: Forest Walk
description: Forest Walk is a game about influencing characters met through dialogue, actions, or items obtained. With branching dialogue paths and outcomes, you can choose to help or ruin those around you as you climb to the top of the mountain.

name: Powerplay
description: Powerplay is an RTS with a focus on resources and industry. Create supply chains, transport, and explore in this thrilling base builder. Grow into a powerful industrial nation, but don't spread too thin! Resources are finite and "the others" can reclaim what is theirs at any time.

name: Srogue
description: Srogue is a snake roguelite where you play as a snake and defeat enemies in order to feast and grow. Unlock new ways to play by gaining experience and choosing items to alter your snake. The goal is to survive as long as possible.

name: Stop, Pawssport Check
description: Stop, Pawssport Check is a fun couch co-op simulation game. Bring your friends and take your place at the border crossings to maintain order and security. Be on the lookout for false documents, suspicious passengers or even smuggling, you can't let anything slip through.. or can you?

name: Sticks Together: The Wishing Well
description: A math-powered adventure awaits! Join the friends on a quest for The Wishing Well. Conquer foes in 2D turn-based combats where your calculation skills are the key to victory. Sharpen your mind by solving math puzzles in a charming world brought to life with a classic cartoon art style!

name: Call to Strike
description: Call to Strike is a Top-Down Helicopter-Based Shooter. Pilot the world’s most lethal aircraft in multiple countries to search, destroy, rescue, and survive.

name: Hidden Square
description: Hidden Square can be both easy and tricky. With its minimalistic design, the game presents a unique challenge of uncovering hidden squares.

name: Cuprum2929
description: After waking up disoriented near the sea, a young kid must navigate through an enigmatic city controlled by AI screens, searching for their missing dog, Pythagora. Solve intricate puzzles housed in unique locations and unravel the secrets of this advanced island and reunite with your companion.

name: RC: Car Maniacs
description: RC:CM is a fascinating arcade simulator of radio-controlled cars that will allow you to plunge into the world of children's fantasies by driving radio-controlled cars: rally, drift, high-speed and other types of cars! Race with your friends! Speed, adrenaline and excitement await you!

name: Stickman Adventure
description: Enter a world where honor weighs more than gold, and every quarrel is decided by the sword. In Stickman Adventure, you become a legendary hero, alone with a large army where only the strongest and smartest survive. Choose the path to glory and show the world that you are a true warrior.

name: Kingdoms of Lost Valleys
description: First in the series will be a turn-based multiplayer Trading Card Game where players can collect, buy, sell, customize, trade, and rent warriors and all this will happen in the game environment.

name: Motu
description: A minimalist 1v1 island battle game, mixing real-time resource collection and combat with turn-based tactics.

name: Slot Gun
description: Slot Gun is a satisfying deckbuilding slot-machine game where you face off against several opponents to control the board. It is a blend of luck and skill where timing is key and dopamine is everywhere.

name: CPA: Reports Bousy
description: Experience the constant fear and loneliness surrounded by the decrepit old walls of an abandoned house with a tragic story, while feeling the true horror of being hunted by a creature created from a strong friendship. Try to survive and scape the house!

name: Heroglobin: Monster Hospital
description: Hazel Harkin, a haematology patient, is struggling with life in hospital. One day they uncover a conspiracy: the hospital is being run by cultists + their monster army! join forces with other patients + fight hordes of monsters to save the world!

name: Tiny Kingdoms
description: Tiny Kingdoms is a peaceful building strategy and puzzle game where you build an enchanting and ever-expanding kingdom by placing tiles on a hexagonal grid. Explore diverse, vibrant biomes, discover and unlock new tiles, and complete quests to bring your world to life!

name: Magic Academy
description: The Magic Academy's gates are open, your acceptance letter in hand. Adventure, mystery, and endless exploration await within.

name: For the Glory of Gods TCG
description: Alternative online turn-based trading card game, that allows you unlimited deck-building options. Three different game modes, including Solo, Gauntlet, and Multiplayer to choose from! Earn cards, packs, and coins, and try to stay on top of the leaderboards For the Glory of Gods.

name: Beyond Horizon: The Astral Expedition
description: Awaken in a surreal realm of giant insects and blurred reality. Guided by a companion, master movement, customize your outfit, and uncover your past. Complete missions to rebuild the city and pursue a mystical orb to return to reality. Will you escape or remain captivated by the astral world?

name: Battle Axe & Final Vendetta Bundle
description: Battle Axe: Battle Axe is an arcade top-down hack & slash featuring high-quality visuals created by veteran pixel artist Henk Nieborg, true to form game mechanics, and music from the legendary VGM composer Manami Matsumae – retro gamers rejoice!

name: Men of War II: Frontline Hero Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: RocketCup
description: Sin descripción

name: MicroGradient
description: You are a starship pilot tasked with fending off an eternal alien invasion. You've been given 3 hulls to achieve this mission, and if you lose all three there is always another pilot ready to take up arms.

name: Thoom
description:
This game title has been an inside joke in community for a while, but it's finally here. Behold! The First First-person shooter game in thumby ... Thoom.

This is a demake version Doom written in MicoPython, with raycasting pseudo-3D and sprite scaling (for upscale only, it looks unrecognizable when downscale).As a proof of concept, there is only one level, filled with Demons and Imps, and locked doors requiring key card to open, and last but not least a small bossfight.

Hope you enjoy this short game. And hope you use this project to create something more fun. (sorry for ugly codes)

name: Everhaven
description:
Everhaven (Working title: Project Dragon) was a cozy sandbox survival crafting multiplayer RPG- a buildable world made of blocks inspired by Minecraft filled with fantasy characters and quests inspired by Breath of the Wild.

This title was abruptly cancelled in the final stages of development and weeks before it's scheduled reveal and Early Access launch by Phoenix Labs's new owner Forte (a blockchain company that recently purchased the studio), resulting in mass studio layoffs.

name: Cast Away: The Oddysee
description: "Cast Away - The Oddysee" is an RPG Maker XP game developed by TheLuigiplayer and LamaZ Game Studio (formerly JS RPG's), which has been in development since 2011. The game is based on the concept of a classic dungeon crawler and follows the story of the sailor "John Maynard," who is named after the ballad by Theodor Fontane. John finds himself stranded on what initially appears to be a deserted island. However, events soon start to unfold, revealing what mysterious occurrences are taking place on that island!

name: Microwave Story
description: Experience some little heartwarming stories in this little Playdate microwave simulator. In this game, you can choose different foods, crank the Playdate, and listen to what the food has to say for themselves...

name: Mother²
description: Mother Squared is a fan remake currently in development of the sleeper hit SNES game, EarthBound.

name: Zook Hero 2
description: Sin descripción

name: LudoRace
description: Sin descripción

name: EarthBound Beginnings Remake
description: A rom hack by Gabbi that remakes EarthBound Beginnings within the original EarthBound, mimicking what the actual developers would have done if it was remade on the SNES.

name: Pornoman
description: Sin descripción

name: Crazy Crab
description: Sin descripción

name: Muso
description:
Muso is an RPG where you take control of a young High School Freshman, named "Atabi" on his journey to discover the secrets of the universe with the help of his childhood friend "Markus", a detective named "Casey," and a rebellious teenage rabbit named "Nuttallii."

Venturing through mysterious worlds created by a mysterious group of antagonists known as, "The Mauve," Atabi and his friends must unlock their true potentials and go through the task of understanding the true intentions of one-another in their misfit group in order to restore balance to the world and merge split realities caused by an unknown force in order to take over the world.

name: Connected Fates
description: A story-driven puzzle adventure game with unconventional game mechanics.

name: Moro's Poodle
description: Join Gift and his friends in their journey to go home! All while uncovering a strange plot as more and more hidden truths about Gift's life rise to the surface.

name: Fragment
description:
Your Creator has disappeared from your world with no explanation. As the youngest among her creations, you have been tasked by the Dreamcaster with finding her and restoring balance to your little corner of the Universe.

You might just be a Little Guy, but everyone is counting on you to overcome the forces of darkness and despair!

name: Soulthread
description: A dynamic, turn-based RPG set in a world full of mystery! Play as Mabel and unravel the secrets of the universe by finding the four crystals of the book. With the help of her old high school friend, Will, and a mysterious mage named Nyxra, anything is possible in this world of epic proportions!

name: clock out.
description: Take on the role of a nervous data analyst trying to calm himself down before a job interview at a mysterious company...

name: Dreamtone
description: Dreamtone is a traditional RPG, set in a whimsical pastiche of the American 1980s!

name: Mother 3.5
description: A rom hack for Mother 3 that restores unused characters, events, and features.

name: Hentai Fox
description: Hentai Fox is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Collapse
description: Experience intense 5v5 online FPS action in our modern take on Promod. Battle in destructible environments, demanding strategic adaptation. Perfect for both veterans and newcomers, gear up for high-octane fun and fierce competition!

name: Pinball Hero
description: In this game the pinball IS the hero! Ascend from the Goblin Caves, to the Perilous Plains and defeat the evil wizard in the Hallowed Castle to reclaim your adventurer spirit! Battle slimes, skeletons, goblins, ghouls, and other fantasy creatures in the retro-inspired reimagining of Pinball.

name: Zalera Spark
description: Zalera spark is a dynamic boss fight game set in a cute magical fantasy world, where you can forge friendships with your various opponents. Adapt by choosing or removing skills of your choice, and find your own way to fight !

name: Stick Infinite Kingdom
description: Master strategic gameplay as you build, train, and upgrade units to protect your statue and king. Switch between leaders, unlock chests, and compete on the leaderboard. With stunning visuals, diverse zombies, and easy controls, it's an epic battle for survival!

name: Pure Blood
description: "Pure Blood" is an Open World MORPG that tells the story of those who had to flee the invaded kingdom to find their throne again, and you can feel the "taste of hand" of Soul-Like through easy manipulation.

name: MSCR
description: Control EMET, a highly advanced Combat Android produced by YAD, a Military Technologies company working for the government, the android was made for tyrannical purposes, but thanks to a mysterious event, your mission now is to bring justice to the world

name: TinkerTech
description: TinkerTech is a game that allows players to design, construct and showcase their unique builds made of customizable blocks. Race, battle or socialize with your creations in multiplayer rooms.

name: Ballad of Angels
description: Collect power-ups, items, and gear to survive against others in this 2D top-down online pvp arena battler. Hone your skills and learn the tech involved with three combat styles, dashing, jumping, blocking, redirecting, and abilities. Collect power-ups to determine your unique build for the game.

name: Wing Haven
description: Wing Haven is a relaxing idle game about building cozy bird sanctuaries. Collect rare and exotic feathered friends, give them plant shelter, and watch them grow in real-time! Progress from a basic enclosure to a beautiful nature preserve in old-growth forest, desert oasis, or wetland climates!

name: Meet the Rookie
description: Explore the small town of Kettle Rock as Detective Lupe, alongside their unlikely partner Sheriff Misra, to solve the case of a mysterious Winery. But things are not as they seem, as something much more sinister lies behind the history of this town.

name: Tower of Doom VR
description: Like the eye of Sauron in the Lord of the Rings, the player stands atop a tall tower overlooking a vast landscape. As enemies march in from all directions, the player must cast spells using various hand-tracking poses to ensure their survival. interactive simulation/art-piece with unique controls.

name: Kinetic Breakthrough
description: Boost and grapple around a cyberpunk cityscape in Kinetic Breakthrough, a high-speed metroidvania. Use your momentum to break through windows, destroy drones, and confront the artificial intelligence that keeps the city under its control.

name: Deadly Descent
description: A co-op horror looting game about exploring luminal spaces, evading monsters, gathering valuable loot and selling it to meet the quota

name: The Dwarf Kingdom
description: Enter the epic fantasy realm of The Dwarf Kingdom - Magic World of War vs Orks and Dragon. Lead your dwarven kingdom to victory through cunning strategy, powerful magic, and skilled diplomacy. Battle fierce enemies, forge alliances, and build your empire in this immersive, action-packed adventure.

name: Vibora
description: The Vibora Virus in Brazil transforms victims into frightening hybrid creatures. It causes fever, convulsions and hallucinations before metamorphosis. The creatures are relentless predators, defying efforts to contain the infection.

name: Tickety Boom
description: Join Max and Vic in this gripping 2D pixel art puzzle game as they race against time to defuse a series of sophisticated bombs. But who is planting these elaborate devices? Play now to unmask the mastermind, unravel the mystery and save the city.

name: Fangs & Forges
description: Fangs & Forges is a tactical turn-based RPG. Lead your squad through a medieval high-fantasy world. Recruit characters, accept missions and battle monsters, bandits and more for reputation and loot. Explore the world, level up your characters and stop ancient corruption devouring the world... again.

name: Don't Win
description: Don't Win is a small, cosy, puzzle mindbender with platform elements. Whatever you do, DON'T WIN!

name: Bob
description: You are Bob, a floppy ragdoll, gain strength by knocking out enemy 'Bobs'. Use your strength to take on bigger 'Bobs' and knock them down with your fists or any object you find on the ground. (Or just throw the 'Bob' off the edge of the map) Defeat the final Bob and unlock new levels and game modes.

name: NecroStone
description: Embark on an action RPG journey as a necromancer, summoning champions and casting powerful necromancy to defeat wicked spirits. It features sandbox elements allowing you to collect various monsters and craft your own powerful champions by directly disassembling and assembling bodies.

name: Space Operators
description: Your mission is to capture newly discovered moons for the Mega Corporation Mining Industry in this retro environment.

name: Echoes of Elpis
description: Echoes of Elpis is a twin-stick shooter sci-fi roguelite. Upgrade weapons, discover new tech, and uncover a secret past as you battle through Elpis on an epic treasure hunt.

name: PeraPera Mountain
description: Hack and slash your way to the top of PERAPERA Mountain while you learn Japanese. Cast spells, acquire new abilities, build synergies and level up your Japanese skills in each unique run.

name: Primest Evil
description: BETRAYAL! As the Prime Evil, you were once the greatest force for bad there was in your slice of the universe...until you got a knife in your back for all your efforts. Rise from your grave again and again in this comedic cartoon roguelike adventure!

name: Dino Jump
description: Dino Jump is an endless runner, where you control a dinosaur with a pistol, and a lot of skins to be more stylish!

name: Project Adrenaline
description: Project Adrenaline is the future of Arena Shooters. Find yourself surrounded by a roaring crowd as you wall-run, climb, slide and kill to ultimate glory. Some would call you an athlete, others see you as a killer; but to the blood-thirsty audience, you are simply known as a neon-gladiator.

name: Gus Game
description: Gus Game is a multiplayer party game that immerses you in a fantastic world full of hilarious and competitive mini-games. Gus Game allows you to compete against your friends in challenges such as cannonball throwing, obstacle courses, and much more...

name: Garden Apocalypse
description: Following a catastrophic invasion by a swarm that has decimated civilization. The protagonist, a resilient country dweller living on the outskirts of urban areas, must use his exceptional horticultural skills to preserve and defend his gardens against relentless swarm attacks.

name: Websling
description: Websling is an action roguelike game about swinging, battling bugs and collecting powerful items. Bouncing between the past and the future, players take control of a small jumping spider who must use their webs to defeat powerful foes from across time and space.

name: Radland
description: Radland is an open world survival game with a deep story and base building elements. Gather resources, build your base, grow your own food trade with survivors, complete the quests and eliminate all raider and mutant threat that is roaming what is left of United States.

name: Talus
description: Explore the unknown lands of Talus. Play the way you want with hundreds of builds to choose from! Complete randomized dungeons, obtain epic loot, craft your perfect gear and hunt down uber bosses. Talus is a Diablo II/Path of Exile inspired Action RPG set in a vibrant fantasy 2D world.

name: Linksider
description: Linksider is puzzle platfomer where you can attach different "Side Effects" to the sides of your character. Utilize these effects creatively and you may discover surprising interactions between them to help you solve various puzzles.

name: Munches
description: Food, we need food! Help Tixa get food for her village and find out what happened to the harvest, spreading munches and punches!

name: Icosagon
description: A deck builder tower defense game, in which you create a deck of cards which can used to place down towers that can defeat incoming enemies. Complete campaigns, collect cards, and assemble the best deck!

name: Ritter & Rotwein
description: The Past is red. And some Knights recalling it. Storis about the moust Gloryes Duels, sharp weapons and eaven sharper minds. Always looking for wealth, sweet Ladies, and the truth. You play as Ragdoll-Knights with diferent Wappons and Armor Sets out of the 15th century.

name: Sledge
description: Take your explosive sledgehammer to the skies to pulverize the machines that killed gods and usurped the heavens.

name: Poison is Served!
description: "Poison is Served!" is a food taster simulator with mix of cozy management puzzle and narrative-driven roguelike in world where almost all food is poisoned. Taste delicious antic meals, analyze you health and try to survive.

name: Shadow of The Abyss
description: Shadow Of The Abyss is a psychological horror game where you play through the eyes of a bodycam. As a security guard, your job is to survey an office building during a night shift, until you fall into the hands of fate.

name: The Tragedy at Deer Creek
description: Photographer Charlotte Gray travels to Deer Creek to document a long deserted logging camp for her upcoming book ”Abandoned Alaska”. She finds not only a derelict camp, but also a mournful tale of family, love and loyalty hidden beneath the Alaskan snow, in this point-and-click adventure.

name: Bestowment
description: The fun and intricacy of a collectible card game meets the endless replayability of a roguelike. Collect terrifying creatures and powerful spells to craft your unique deck in a sprawling campaign seeking audience with the 6 great gods in a quest to discover who you really are

name: Nightmare of May
description: "Nightmare of May" is an atmospheric horror game set in 1960s Southeast Asia. Combining elements of Southeast Asian and Eastern cultures, the game features witchcraft, religious themes, and unsettling imagery for a truly immersive experience.

name: Brawl of America
description: Welcome to Brawl of America, the wackiest physics-based brawler where chaos reigns supreme! Dive into frenetic battles where everything and everyone is a weapon. From chairs and tables to your fellow brawlers, if you can pick it up, you can throw it!

name: Mr Monkey & Touc
description: An N64 throwback 3D collectathon. Play as Mr Monkey and his partner Touc to save their friends and the jungle they call home, and takedown the robots who threaten it. Explore 7 unique worlds, meet a colourful cast of characters and GO. BANANAS.

name: Streetball Fury
description:
Streetball Fury is a fast paced mix of street basketball and brawling pixel art game, with unique characters, maps and cool tunes. Punch, kick or use your super attacks to get hold of the ball and score more points than your opponents by throwing, dunking or unleashing super FURY shots!

Take part in brawling basketball matches. While punching your opponents is always a fun idea, to win you need to score points by dunking, shooting or using your special FURY ultimates. Engage in local and online, solo or co-op street basketball games. Let the match begin!

name: I Ching: Mysteries of Wenlu
description: A groundbreaking word game infused with wisdom and challenges of the Book of Changes. Solve puzzles through text manipulation and unravel intricacies. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of decoding mystic knowledge of the Chinese civilization.

name: Heist Hustle: The Unrecord Bank Job
description: Heist Hustle: Bank Job urges you to master thievery. Lead a cunning crew in high-stakes heists, using unique skills to infiltrate, take hostages, crack safes, and seize all cash. Time is vital as you await the getaway van for a swift escape. Are you the perfect crime mastermind?

name: Last Mile
description: Last mile - is a first-person car horror game. It seems that you are in a spatial anomaly, you drive through the same places from time to time, maybe your GPS navigator doesn't work? Or maybe there are really, really strange things happening here.

name: Heavenly Parasite
description: Heavenly Parasite is a 2D, hand drawn assist fighting game and will hopefully be available early 2025.

name: Cyclics
description: Cyclics is a 4-Keys Rhythm Game mixed with Catch The Beat in a circular playing field. Test your left right hand coordination and your rhythmic sense.

name: PafuPafu
description: PafuPafu is a party game that combines match-three mechanics with multiplayer brawling elements.

name: Never Be Alone
description: Dive into the post-apocalyptic realm of 'Never Be Alone,' an expansive open-world game designed for both solo and multiplayer experiences. In this zombie survival adventure, you can seamlessly team up with friends or brave the dangers alone.

name: Bravest Coconut
description: You're a little cat named Coco and you're off on a big adventure. Get to know the locals, solve puzzles, fight monsters, find treasure, and explore the beautiful valley in this classic action RPG.

name: Gravitee Wars
description: Battle across the galaxy in this turn-based space artillery game. Use the gravity of destructible planets to launch your shots at the enemy until only one team remains.Unlock new gear for your team members in the single player campaign and online multiplayer modes.

name: Flex Riders
description: Flex Riders is a multiplayer racing game with a unique skate-car physics. Nail sick tricks to obtain combat items and take down your rivals. Race across procedurally generated maps and test your friendship in local or online matches. Race, Skate, and Fight!

name: The Glitch Witch
description: In a tech-dead future, you play as Rosette, repairing broken tech by solving circuit puzzles to uncover the lost power of 80s technology. She is thrilled about this discovery - until she faces accusations of witchcraft. Will friendship triumph, or force her to choose between power and acceptance?

name: LumberKill
description: LumberKILL is a Lore-rich Psychological Horror Adventure game about working at a Lumbermill. You will be tasked with increasingly suspicious jobs by your shady boss, each more unsettling than the last. Chop trees, Process logs, and summon god himself in this terrifying game!

name: Tales of the Valente
description: Transforming play into empowerment, guiding players through magical adventures to conquer fears with courage and compassion. Complete puzzles, races and befriend all different kind of creatures to help Bastien overcome his fears.

name: Shinonome Abyss: The Maiden Exorcist
description: The main character is a shrine maiden named "Yono," who has to survive in a haunted houses where Mononoke (yokai and vengeful spirits) lurk, using a limited number of items and traps in this strategy roguelike horror action game!

name: Drunken Rogue
description: The rowdy adventures of drunk-as-a-skunk Rogue Lita and Vampire of Demise Endo! Stagger around traps and stumble through demon assaults. Make your way to the dungeon's deepest depths—rumored to contain the most precious of booze!

name: Elasticritters!
description: Elasticritters!, the dynamic, fast-paced precision platformer filled with daring jumps and wild stunts. Hone your skills and see if you have what it takes to master this exhilarating bouncy adventure!

name: Sweet Home
description: "Sweet Home" has been transformed into a roguelite game.Pick two weapons and set their unique skills.Take down the monsters consumed by desire and liberate 'Cha Hyun Soo'.As a fan of the original, you'll find a richer experience in "Sweet Home".

name: Time in Place
description: A first person sandbox narrative, set in an ever changing cozy apartment. Live in the moment of different mornings, spanning 30 years. Make coffee, play piano, or work on your novel. Uncover clues about the unfolding life around you, or take photos of the morning light coming through the windows.

name: Over The Horizon
description: Over The Horizon is a stylish action metroidvania. Take down enemies in Stylish and defeat boss battles with partner characters as you journey across a world full of secrets. As Ravi, you take to the streets to find your parents and uncover a conspiracy to save the world on the giant planet Horizon.

name: Topworld
description: Explore Topworld, a fantasy sandbox game where you, as a mage, uncover a world of possibilities. Craft, build, fight, and create your world in a charming pixel art style. Shape the land to your liking and experience your unique adventure!

name: Room2Room
description: Children have been vanishing while playing with our brand new Room2Room handheld gaming system. You have been contracted to monitor playtest sessions, document any unwanted quirks, and help young testers play safely.

name: Soccer Party
description: Soccer Party is party game of soccer that delivers chaotic 2 vs 2 matches where skill reigns supreme. Dash, kick, and jump your way through unpredictable environments filled with obstacles. No power-ups, no gimmicks - just pure soccer action!

name: Game Designer Simulator
description: Game Designer Simulator is a pixel game based on real-life themes, with a non-linear storyline and card battles. Players will take on the role of a newly graduated college student in a fictional city based on Shanghai, experiencing everything from interviews to becoming a novice game Designer.

name: Sanctua
description: Sanctua is a thrilling co-op party game where players must work together to survive and escape a cursed tomb. One of them is corrupted and will play as an ancient entity that hunts other explorers.

name: Magic Storm
description: Slay thousands of monsters and survive the night raids, where new bosses and monsters appear. Magic Storm is a casual game with roguelite elements where your choices make all the difference, create custom builds and survive the final eclipse

name: Full English City
description: This game combines English Practice with the gameplay of a “Card Battler”. Collect cards by freely creating English sentences and win battles while building unique decks.

name: Robin In Da Hood
description: Robin in da Hood is a light and humorous take on the famous legend of Robin Hood. It is a 3D, top-down single player action-adventure game set in medieval England.

name: Heart of Altai
description: A walking simulator about a mysterious story in the mountains of the Altai Republic.

name: Dungeum
description: Embark on an endless turn-based adventure in Dungeum, a strategic dungeon crawler where every decision shapes your journey through treacherous depths.

name: The King is Dead
description: You're entangled in a royal conspiracy. A deadly game where the pieces can become friends, foes, lovers, and of course… sacrifices.

name: Homecall
description: Horror-ambiance in low-poly. Open-ended exploration, investigation, hidden items, interesting puzzles and intriguing dark storyline.

name: Red Thread
description: Dive into "Red Thread," a singleplayer strategy card game where you navigate life's complexities through relationships. Build connections, manage challenges, and achieve your goals. Each choice shapes your destiny. Can you weave your path to success?

name: Santaower Defense
description: Defend Santa's house from hordes of ghosts with defense various structures and also with your own sword.

name: Go Up Bird!
description: Navigate through narrow passages and avoid the encroaching obstacles that threaten to end her lofty quest.

name: Jump Ball Jump!
description: Jump Ball Jump! is an exciting and challenging game that tests your ability to calculate trajectories and angles.

name: Collapse Machine
description: Collapse Machine offers the ultimate adventure in an infinite procedural immersive world. Traverse the sands in a mobile home vehicles, exploring secrets and treasures with friends (or foes), all while experiencing the thrill of discovery without constraints

name: Cape Fathom
description: In Cape Fathom you have been tasked with restoring an abandoned restaurant in an effort to return prosperity to a once bustling region. Utilize various, but limited, resources to source the highest quality ingredients for your patrons. Use your influence to shape the local economy and environment.

name: Paranatural
description: A new, innovative ghost hunting horror game. Work together with up to 3 others or go solo identifying and exorcising ghosts! Experience horror gaming beyond anything you've ever seen before with a fully dynamic ghost system, a built-in level editor, player customization, VR support, and more!

name: Funny Face Apartment
description: "Funny Face Apartment" is a first-person stealth horror game where you, as a caretaker, manage tasks and investigate residents who turn into funny faces. Isolated in danger, you encounter an entity that reveals the mystery behind these transformations, unraveling your chaotic life.

name: Lady Death Demonicron
description: LADY DEATH: DEMONICRON is an all new side-scrolling, sword slicing, magic wielding, 15 level, multiplayer beat-em-up that takes the best aspects of the 1990's arcade classics - all mixed together with a killer 90's industrial-metal soundtrack!

name: The Trials 2
description: The Trials is a mesmerizing puzzle and exloration game that will challenge your mind, this game takes you on an unforgettable journey through an island filled stunning environment. Master the art of teleportation, time manipulation, moving between alternate world to solve intricate puzzles.

name: Eldoria: The Cursed Crown
description: Explore Eldwyrm's vast open world, engage in strategic combat, and craft gear. Encounter dynamic NPCs and choose your story path in this immersive RPG.

name: Firework Syndrome
description: You'll respond to the villagers' requests as the new Pyrotechnician of the village called Natsuwa. Draw your own fireworks and use them to mark special moments and illuminate the night sky to touch every heart with your dazzling artistry.

name: Why Did The Chicken Cross The Road?
description: A pixel-art shooter roguelike with almost infinity of options to upgrade your weapons. Will you be able to fly the coop and find the answers that your people have been searching for years?

name: Megadungeon
description: A fast paced, turn based dungeon crawler.

name: Vincent
description: Explore the life of Vincent, a homeless man with a mysterious past, in this Jump&Walk game. Dive into his yellowed sketches, each revealing a hidden memory. Uncover secrets, visit idyllic places, and discover the truth.

name: Warriors of Thalyrion
description: Choose your hero and fight against your friends in different 2D pixelart worlds . Collect more items than your opponent and fight him in close combat or with a ranged weapon.

name: Portal Brawlers
description: Portal Brawlers is a Beat-em-Up set in a vibrant fantasy world. Follow Thunk and friends as they wreak havoc across the land, trying to stop whatever malevolent force is summoning trouble through these portals!

name: Tame It Too!
description: This is the sequel to the game Tame It! The adventures of Lee, who crashed and found himself on a desert island, continue! A new big island full of life and the freedom to explore it, as well as new hot beauties to tame await you in this game.

name: Mod Mage Mike
description: Mod Mage Mike is an action puzzle game where you use a node editor to program futuristic magic spells. Hit detectors placed in tricky locations, blast evil robots with custom-made spells, or use the built-in level editor to create and share your own imaginative levels.

name: Lady Godiva
description: Lady Godiva is immersed in her tireless quest for revenge and justice. In the first period, set in a distant and turbulent past, a powerful and fearless female figure emerges, whose true name remains shrouded in mystery. She, however, is confused with the legendary historical figure who rode naked.

name: Park It!
description: Park It! is a grid-based puzzle game that involves the challenging vehicle maneuver of parking a car!

name: Plati and the Tower of Time
description: Plati and the Tower of Time is a challenging precision platformer with a focus on mobility and speed. Use your grappling hook to swing around multiples levels to find out what is at the end of the tower as fast as you can.

name: Nine in Flight
description: An absurdist mystery for only the most hard-boiled interim junior detectives.

name: Dawn of Defense
description: Dawn of Defense is a Roguelite Tower Defense game with RTS elements. Surrounded by enemies, your tribe is the last bastion against the Empire. Build towers to fight enemy troops in the trenches, train warriors and retake territory to build on. Reclaim your lands and defeat the baneful Empire!

name: Phasmonauts
description: Phasmonauts is a 4 player local co-op supernatural roguelite. Cryptid sightings are on the rise! It’s up to you and your friends to invent ghost-hunting equipment to solve the mystery and fight these supernatural creatures.

name: Myth & Mirage
description: Hack and slash your way through the Tombs of Oasis. Extracting with your loot will require all the skill your team can muster as you mow down vicious monsters, face deadly traps and slaughter other players! Carefully craft your build and customize your character with unique items and skill trees.

name: Recursive Riftfall
description: Explore dungeons, collect loot, and avoid dangers in this exotic looter! Play solo or with as many as the host can handle. Power your ship and yourselves with the resources you find to ensure your continued survival.

name: Monster Charmer
description: Delve into a mystical world teeming with goblins, orcs, minotaurs and more in this adult deckbuilding RPG. Traverse through a beautiful fantasy world, collect powerful cards, and construct your deck of charms and spells as you fight - or charm - your way to victory!

name: Neon Express
description: Take the helm in this cyberpunk uber driver narrative mystery. Traverse the city delivering contraband and nefarious passengers. Rekindle old contacts and reconnect with an underworld you were trying to leave behind.

name: Kanban-mura
description: Sin descripción

name: End's beginning
description: 'End’s beginning' is a Japanese-style fantasy romance visual novel. As Carter Evan, uncover the truth behind his death and Shermanland's fall. With a nearly 300,000-word script, experience four unique relationships: Brother and Brother, Monarch and Knight, God and Follower, and Vampire and Prey.

name: Carpathian Skies
description: Sin descripción

name: Vectorman
description: Vectorman for the PlayStation 2 is an unreleased reboot of the Vectorman series (consisting of Vectorman and Vectorman 2 for the Sega Mega Drive) developed by Pseudo Interactive for Sega.

name: Fallen Lights
description: Sin descripción

name: Forestrike
description: Forestrike is a tactical kung-fu fighting game with a supernatural twist. Use your 'foresight' ability to visualize fights before they happen and hone your skills then rumble in reality, where defeat means starting over from scratch.

name: Mystery Science Theater 3000 Presents: Detective
description: A rewrite of Matt Barringer's incredibly bad game "Detective", this game was ported to Inform and subjected to treatment with Mystery Science Theater 3000 sarcasm.

name: Stealth Kill VR Missions
description: Welcome to D.A.R.P., Operator. You have been chosen to prove your Infiltration, Weapons and Explosives skills throughout various objectives in this Physics based Stealth Action VR Game. Candidates unable to comply or show signs of weakness, will be terminated immediately.

name: Pinko Linko's School
description:
Pinko Linko's School is a game I dug up not too long ago when I was visiting my grandparents. I found it while searching for some old tennis equipment in there storage. The box indicated that it was made in 1998, and yes, you can truly see that it is from that era. The first Doom game also came out in 1998, so this must have been some kind of kids-learning-toy-doom-clone. Anyway, I got it running and managed to rip the files, so here they are!

Side note: I rebinded all the keys from being the arrow keys to wasd, also there were some things in the game that were kind of [REDACTED], but that might have just been me. When you are done with the game you can take a look in the YouWon folder, I left [REDACTED] in there,

name: Guitar Hero: Avril Lavigne
description: Guitar Hero: Avril Lavigne is a bootleg PlayStation 2 game. The game is a modded version of Guitar Hero II which adds songs by Avril Lavigne into the game.

name: Guitar Hero: Sonic VS Mario
description: Guitar Hero: Sonic VS Mario is a bootleg game for the PlayStation 2 released in Brazil. The game is a modded version of Guitar Hero III featuring primarily songs from the Mario and Sonic games.

name: Dance Gangnam Style
description: Dance Gangnam Style is a bootleg NES game developed by an unknown company. The game is a modded version of another NES bootleg titled "Street Dance", which is a clone of DDR, but instead only including the song Gangnam Style. It is bundled into the Play Vision Portable system.

name: One Helluva Reskin for Pizza Tower
description: Aiming to replace every major character AND boss with beloved characters from Spindlehorse's Helluva Boss and Hazbin Hotel (mostly Helluva). Featuring Moxxie in the place of Peppino trying to save I.M.P along with Millie and that hellhound no one cares about.

name: Duskfade
description: Duskfade is a colorful adventure in a world where the torments of the past haunt you. Battle against your memories in a dizzying dance to fade the shadows of the dusk.

name: Beyond the Forbidden Lands
description: Beyond the Forbidden Lands is a non-profit fan-made PC remake of Shadow of the Colossus with the restoration of cut content as a major focus, including the Unused Colossi and removed areas from the game. The game will provide the option of playing as close to the original Shadow of the Colossus as possible, along with the inclusion of a 'Story Mode' which is set before SotC.

name: Tribute to Shadow of the Colossus
description: Tribute to Shadow of the Colossus, also known as just 'Tribute', is a passionate Brazilian fan project dedicated to honoring the timeless masterpiece that is Shadow of the Colossus by remaking it on PC and not only restoring all the cut content, but also the ideas that Team Ico could not even began to program due to time constraints. With a soulful dedication, Team Tribute is bringing to life to all the unused colossi —Griffin, Devil, Phoenix, Roc, Saru, Sirius, Spider, Worm, Yamori and Evis— infusing them with the essence of the game's original vision.

name: Industrial Fear
description: A short, atmospheric psychological horror where you play as a factory worker finishing his shift. There are multiple endings to complete and collectables

name: Fervent
description:
A short, VHS - style horror game where you step into the shoes of a paranormal investigator. As you venture into the eerie Fervent Campsite, you'll uncover mysterious obelisks with cryptic symbols, abandoned white tents, and an unsettling ritual book.

Average playtime is 10 minutes.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Premium Edition
description: A premium edition of the game Fantasy Beauties that contains the girls Ophelia, Jade, Freya, Luna and Poppy from the beginning.

name: Puzzle Drop Carnival
description: Sin descripción

name: CrusaDoom
description: Sin descripción

name: WeFly
description: WeFly was a flight simulator for the Wii, which was originally pitched as a PilotWings game however was rejected by Nintendo and later reworked into a new IP before being cancelled. The game was going to be an open-world game which was going to allow the player to fly around the globe and visit various famous cities on Earth. The game was also going to use the Wii's Forecast Channel to accurately simulate the weather and time of day in the real world locations.

name: Ticuto
description: Ticuto is an immersive and engaging game that transports players through various worlds and dimensions. The game’s theme revolves around time travel and exploration, offering a rich narrative that allows players to journey across different eras and settings. As a blend of adventure, puzzle, and farming genres, Ticuto challenges players with intricate puzzles and quests that require strategic thinking and problem-solving skills, alongside the management and cultivation of virtual farms.

name: We'll Be Alright
description: Jonghyun, a strange cafe owner, runs the Zodiac Cafe with a side business in the back. He tells fortunes from reading tea leaves for curious customers- who lean more supernatural than not. Even mythological entities want to know how their life will pan out!
